There was nothing scary or interesting about to watch. It felt and looked like an extremely low budget student film that was rushed. If that's what they were going for then why would they need to shoot it in Bulgaria if they could've done it in their backyard? The creeper looked cheaply put together and the storyline felt like rosemarys baby but even more nonsensical. Either let the rights of the movie go back and make a proper sequel or let it go.........

review_title: All the production value in the world could not save this movie

review_detailed_main: Okay, let's be honest, after 1 and 2 the series has struggled. The third one was really bad. But evidently I am in a minority here, in that I think this one, number four is actually pretty good. I think it goes in a new direction, not always successfully, but in a new direction that is at least entertaining. The story is fleshed out some and while the bad guy creeper character is not as charming a bad guy as he was in the first two episodes, he is passable in this one. What makes the difference for me in this particular episode is the lead actress Sydney craven. I think she held her own very well and her boyfriend character was also very good. Several of the supporting characters are quirky enough to be entertaining. All in all not the worst hour and a half I've ever spent and in comparison to the third film, it's a masterpiece! In comparison to the first two, eh, not so bad. Admittedly, they were difficult acts to follow. On it's own, a decent film.

review_title: THE WORST THING RELEASED IN 2022 / THE ONLY POSITIVE THING IS JARREAU BENJAMIN'S PERFORMANCE
review_detailed_main:
Jeepers Creepers Reborn is just a 2022 movie that emulates and copies the 80's classics, it's a movie that lacks identity. It's a weird mix between I Know What You Did Last Summer and the Nightmare on Elm Street movies. The worst thing about the movie is the CGI that told this "director" that the movie looked good with so many bad effects, but what can you expect from the director of Iron Sky. Screen Media Films is screwing up Jeepers Creepers, what a lousy job and handling of the franchise they're doing. The plot doesn't make sense, it's incoherent and it moves away from what was established in the first movies... This doesn't look like Jeepers Creepers the movie if you change the title and the image of the creeper wouldn't look like cheap slasher work from another creature but the truth is that it is disappointing. Jeepers Creepers Reborn is the best example that sometimes movies made with a mobile camera have even better quality... I don't recommend it

Jarreau Benjamin is the only good actor in the film, but perhaps the design that was chosen for The Creeper is not exactly the best, it is understood that the design emulates the art of Kewber Ball from some comic book covers but by bringing that design to the movies Well, it just didn't work and it's a mistake.

DO NOT WATCH THE NEW JEEPERS CREEPERS. True horror fans will be highly disappointed.

The movie was nothing but cgi and green screens from rushed production. They made Jeepers look more human like and based the film on sacrificial bs... no jump scares, no reason to cover your eyes, it looked like it should be on 123 movies... my horror heart is hurt 😭 I don't know what was worse the fact that the town became tied into it to bring sacrifices or the fact they changed the theme song! I think the only thing they kept that was true to story was the weapon choice and the truck. Other than that it was truly not with the watch.

review_title: This movie makes JC3 look like a masterpiece.

review_detailed_main:

Is Nightmare on Elm Street less cheese or even Friday the 13th and Halloween? Those are all great franchises as well and I'm probably going to visit Nightmare on Elm Street if it's on any of the streamers because my DVDs are packed away because I recently moved.

I've seen all four Jeepers Creepers now and I liked this one as well as the others. IMO the people with one and two ⭐ even three and four ⭐ aren't actual Jeepers Creepers fans or they've never seen a Jeepers Creepers movie before. It's definitely not ten ⭐ Worthy but seven ⭐ are adequate.

Don't waste your time with this one. Visually one of the worst films I've ever seen. There was no effort put into this. It looks incredibly cheap. The creepers costume looked like it was made out of garbage bags.

The plot is weak. It's very boring and doesn't capture the suspense and horror of the original film. The only frightening thing about this film is how shockingly bad it is.

The acting is not good either. I cringed too many times during this one. The performances are very unconvincing.

It's a forgettable film in most aspects. The only thing I'll remember about this is the lackluster visuals.

How bad is this movie? It makes you forget Victor Salvas crimes... that is how bad this movie is.... IMBD need to create a zero star rating asap. Nothing about this mess of a movie is memorable. These "actors" for less of a better word are what agencies keep as emergency substitution for bad actors who pass on roles. The special effects are beyond bad and the people behind them should quit the industry. The writers and director should quit and become stores stockers and never try to make another movie ever again. Jeepers creepers reborn is the miscarriage of sequels and it shows in every second of its brief runtime.

review_title: An absolute joke of a film. Embarrassing for all involved.
review_detailed_main:
Loved the original.

The 2nd was pretty good.

3rd oh no.

So. Thought....they've got rid of the sicko director and all his nasty fiddling crimes, starting fresh. May be good. Right.

WRONG.

Poor Dee Wallace. Admired her work in the 80s. Great actress. And her scene at the start was bearable. Only thing that was.

I'm unsure where to start with this film, there's so much wrong with it.

The script. Simply poor. Almost no attempt at a real story. Two main characters who seem like strangers to each other, clearly uncomfortable around each other, know nothing about each other at all yet supposedly about to get engaged!? Wth! Zero chemistry between them. Arely tolerable acting chops and a 'plain' female who is clearly intended to be hot and sexy (failed) with a geeky nerd boyfriend.

It's impossible le to not notice the Incredibly poor green screen environments and backgrounds. So low quality and look straight out of a cheap kids tv show in the 80s. How could they think that was passable as!? Surely when editing it they must have thought.....'we can't release these scenes, they look terrible'.

I've seen far higher quality 'fanfilms' than this mess.

Everyone involved would do well to take their names from the credits.

Think I'm exaggerating? Then by all means fill ya boots but don't say you weren't warned about it.

Luckily I never paid to see this or I'd demand my money back. I did lose 90mins of my time though.

It's shocking how a film this poor can get a release nowadays when so much is possible and cheaper.

Jeepers Creepers deserved so much better. Its a much loved couple of films, (slightly tainted by a sick criminal director) but a fantastic monster ......it deserves a studio putting its money where its mouth is and doing it right with a competent crew on board. Then see the money come in. Not going to fool the fans with dross like this.

Epic fail and the people who made the decisions should be sacked.

Ok so the very beginning of the movie was probably the best part. The Creeper looks horrible along with the horrible CGI. Main characters are the typical horror movie characters. The movie literally talks about the other 3 movies. Movie has real life mentions of other movies. Every scene background is the worst CGI. Honestly looked like a video game other then the characters. The plot is just horrible, has no relevance to any of the other movies(other than the beginning) The kills we're ok, but honestly gives a Halloween vibe. Just wait till it's free on Netflix because this movie isn't going to be in theaters long. Average rating 4/10.

review_title: What is wrong with Directors these days

review_detailed_main:
Why do they bother? Who are those scriptwriters, producers, directors,to possess none of the good taste and "know how" of a worthwhile movie production?

Love a good horror movie. Grew up in the 80' ,have watched world's most horrors from 60s, 70's,80's,etc.

It would be rather difficult to even rate this movie,against any half decent horror I have ever seen.

The movie begins with a couple driving to a festival in Louisiana.

You get impression they are just friends, is the black boyfriend of a stunning white girl in line with El Ninia woke climat change we are made to suffer?

Well, there is no chemistry there, every scene between them feels fake .

She is apparently pregnant, but have they done it?

It feels improbable,wrong, him enamoured and her pouting and unhappy somber look, she thinks now...she is pensive now, she must know something we dont...

What does the scene with skinny weird fellow in tight clothes and mokasins,driving fancy car and stooping for a piddle in the forrest,whom the girl calls from the car means?

Is he her boyfriend,lover, or is he a compulsory presence of diversity in the production.

He gets gobbled up by the monster anyway,so there's the end of that.

Question unanswered, why ,what, ...then ,monster ate him anyway...

Director has no fresh ideas to actually make this movie scary.

The moment when creeper is "waking up", actually made me laugh, it looks funny, not scary, its green gooey, grinning face hilariously grotesque.

I think that producers and directors of such terribly bad movies are offending audiences intelligence and good taste.

The cinematic tripe that is produced en masse nowadays, surely expects audience full of cinematic troglodytes , therefore it offends viewers who boast at least 2 neurons between the ears.

Is it really time to pack and depart this world, where decent movies already have been made, and we are left to suffer ongoing decline of quality in the movie world?

Please have respect for your valuable time, do not waste it on watching this .

This is a big 0. This movie was horrible. Jeeper Creepers 1 will out top all the Jeeper Creepers that come out. Jasper Creepers was too short, and small, and his acting was not strong. Whoever did the makeup, needs to go back and look at the first Jeepers Creepers. The makeup was horrible. When it first start, they did good with going back to the beginning of the first Jeeper Creepers but then went way off strips. Can someone please come out with a really good horror movie of Jeeper Creepers? I waste my money on Jeeper Creepers 3 and 4. I still love Jeeper Creepers 1. We need a really good horror movie. Thanks.

review_title: Its nowhere as bad as peoples make it out to be, but it has problems.
review_detailed_main:
I watched the first 2 movies when they came out on DVD way back but i never saw the third, as i heard it was pretty cheap, mostly in daylight and no french audio was available on the DVD. Maybe one day i will watch it but i digress.

This movie establish that the first 3 movie are basically "based on the creeper legend" and not in continuity with this. Like they exist in this universe. So yes there is change to the lore and the creature but why not? Its meant as a kinda soft reboot in a way.

Watching this close to Halloween as i did definately help because it has a pretty thematic first half. Yes the festival look more like a college party you may say, without much attendees, but the costumes are pretty cool, the atmosphere etc.

Without going into spoilers the "killing field" has some pretty cool yet basic locations. There is a few issues tough. The first one is the color grading and CGI. I am not talking about kills per say or gore but rather the overall tone. Its clear that the sky is CGI, the color grading is way too bright for at night, and yes they do show the moon in the sky but cmon lets be real, no moon shine THAT bright.

When it comes to kills, some are off screens but you do see some and like i said the gore and blood was fine. Its nothing super original or insanely great, but its done well enough.

Its hard for me to judge the acting because its one of those VVS terrible french translation, wich i guess is the price to pay to watch a movie in my language when its a low budget. I am pretty sure 2 characters were dubbed by the same actor as well barely changing his voice. And if you are french in Quebec, you will recognize these voices in many many...MANY VVS productions.

Overall its a low budget horror and it show a bit, but its not awfull at all. If you can move over the color grading and questionable "background cgi" its actually a solid effort. Won't be a cult classic by any means but was fun to watch at 11pm in Halloween season.

review_title: So angry how bad this was
review_detailed_main: I really love the first three Jeepers Creepers, this had no storyline to it and the creeper was not scary horrible movie would never watch again I'm so disappointed that I waited this long and be this disappointed. The writers have absolutely no clue what they are doing when they wrote this movie. The Jeepers Creepers truck wasn't even in it. The acting was atrocious. My heart is so hurt that I waited so long for this movie and I'm so disappointed that we didn't get any answers where the Jeep are even came from or what it's doing there. When the creeper came out it's like how did he get there?

review_title: It's not as bad as it seems... it's worse!
review_detailed_main: In that kind of horror movies.. the opening scene is the best sign to figure out if is gonna be good or bad! Well after this ridiculous start, i knew that it would be bad, but i had already order a pizza and i wanted to see a movie while i was eating... so i kept going.. but every single minute was harmful.. the costume was so fake, the special effects.. wasn't that special i suppose and the dialogues completely ridiculous.. the acting was a tragedy.. or should i say a comedy and in the plot-line was pointless and boring... ok avoid this movie as hell... even if you are a prisoner and you have plenty of time. There is nothing in common with the franchise... not even close!

I can't really say much more than what others have put before me really. I just felt I needed to write a review to help safeguard any other potential viewers.

It's too late for me but it needn't be for you honestly! There is no word other than tripe.

Peter Brooks character was the only redeeming feature and the film pooped on him at the end.

The Creeper now just acts badly, the whole portrayal reminded me of something out of green street with its dire swagger and false mannerisms and the two protagonists had as much chemistry between them as a plugged in kettle in the bath.

I should have heeded the warnings when Dee Wallace appeared early on as she hasn't giben herself to a good movie since E. T.

Anyway, stay away. Watch paint dry or put vinegar in your eyes, either option is better than this film!

review_title: The new generation of filmmakers has it sooooo wrong.
review_detailed_main: Young, wistful, enthusiastic but oh so uneducated in the wiles of delivering, and more importantly understanding, what makes a classic horror film. The "How to Butcher a Classic 101" class has just graduated. As other reviewers have already conceded, and most admittedly are likely casual film watchers and appreciators rather than bona fide filmmakers, trying to lay open all the errors, omissions, technical inadequacies, and downright gaffs that were made in the process of bringing this to the screen, could fill a tome the size of Plato's Illiad. A word to the wise - the great villains of original horror remain in the shadows for the best part of 2/3 (ish) of a movie's run time, maybe emerging briefly over the films course to raise the tension, but NEVER in a manner that reveals so much that the fear, anticipation, and downright surprise, is lost. Even when you know who the villain is and what's at stake. Look at Aliens (okay not a horror per se, but was it exciting? Even though you knew who the villains were?). It's all about building to a climax - as in most things. Sequels, prequels, re-imaginings, reworkings, remakes all (and I mean in terms of recent franchises) seem to have forgotten this one, important, nay almost singularly most critical, point of storytelling; never reveal the source of the fear until the audience is so engrossed they cannot help but watch for the outcome. Alien is a classic example of this. The Thing, Halloween (original), The Howling etc etc etc. All classics without peer. Because screenwriters, and filmmakers knew then what made people tick. The fundamental failing of horror franchises today is in capitulating to what they perceive as an audience call for kill-count irregardless of story, plot, or character motivation. But that's not what entertains the majority; that's an unassailable fact. It's story, suspense, fear of the unknown, the unseen, the darkness - core human fears that have existed since the beginning of man's time on earth. That is why today's executives who greenlight these woeful, under-developed, derivative, kill-count focused insults to the classics, will never support anything that seems like it's a 'throw-back' to decades past ie. Good, solid, original, developed, and story-focused that tap into primal fears. They have been fed dross, blood, gore, violence without cause, and now doing what they know through nurture, feed the rest of us the same slop. Somehow, somewhere, someone needs to get a firm hand on all this and go back to the basics, to the historically accepted methods and modes of storytelling that have been in existence since before the time of Aristotle. It isn't about changing the shape of the wheel, only the material the wheel is made of. It's about feeding audience expectation but in an unexpected way. It's so simple. Sadly, the young studio executives of today, and the filmmakers they exalt, seem to think changing the wheel shape makes them an auteur and worthy of admiration. The wakeup they all need is that the opposite is true. Jeepers Creepers: Reborn was bad in sooooo many ways, not least in its awful script. The writer should hang his/her/their head in shame. The executive who read it and thought 'yep, this one's ready to go' needs sacking. Cos he/she/they've just cost the studio/investor a good few quid that they'll never, and yes you know it, never get back. It wasn't worthy of being called a production ready script (and I know, cos I write, and have done for 25 years) - by at least another ten drafts. And that's being optimistic. Lighting, camera, sound, VFX (so much bad greenscreen it made my eyes hurt), production design, direction, and performances - all were dismally woeful and so much less than the original story deserved as a follow up. A director's primary job on set is to get the actors to deliver - to elicit believable, truthful presentation of character. That's a skill not everyone has. Clearly this director doesn't have it either. Dee Wallace, what were you thinking? When the foundation of your movie isn't properly formulated is it any wonder that everything else built upon it is shaky? Whilst they've butchered Halloween, Nightmare on Elm Street, TCM, Carrie, The Hills Have Eyes, IKWYDLS, with re-imaginings and some with untold numbers of sequels, this one, Jeepers Creepers: Reborn stands out as one of the worst to date IMHO. And I wouldn't be at all amazed if, as a franchise, it is subsequently consigned to the annals of history as a golden opportunity that went wide, oh so very wide, of the classic quality mark. Oh boy, can I get a refund on the time I've lost?!

Worst one of the franchise, hands down. They clearly spent their budget in the first five minutes. Special effects were horrible and the acting was worse. It was not even that "it's intentionally bad to be good" kinda bad, it's just bad! I'm so sad I paid $7 to watch this :'( It felt like someone had a script for another movie and someone said "ok, but add the Creeper!"... maybe they can rectify this with a decently produced sequel that writes this off as a B movie in the universe. I can sit through a lot of bad movies but this was almost intolerable. Stay clear, unless you just wanna watch it to say you did.

review_title: Who thought this was a good idea?
review_detailed_main:
Say what you want about Victor Salva, he atleast had a vision of what the Creeper was. This guy? No talent for directing what so ever. Idk how he got the rights to make this movie. For one, never ever make a Creeper movie without Jonathan Breck. Secondly, make sure you have real locations to use not CGI green screen crap. And really? A cult plot line? Does every horror franchise need a cult plot at some point? Acting? HA. These "actors" are worse than sharknado. No. I'm serious. And what the F is with this white bird? Ooooooo it's scary cause it's not black like the other birds. Give me a break. Crazy thing is it seems they cut alot out of this movie cause behind the scenes video shows alot more at the actual festival. Can't imagine it was worse than what we got but then again this director made iron sky. If you've seen Hallowen: the curse of Michael Myers than this whole baby plot isn't new. It sure is terrible though.

All in all, don't watch it. Maybe someone with an ounce of talent will make a real Creeper movie one day. Till then looks like it's this cheap knockoff crap. (BTW jeepers creepers 3 is better than this if you can believe that)

The crew who are responsible for writing the script, plot, CGI, and choosing the cast should be embarrassed with themselves.

The actors weren't good at all. I have seen better acting in soap commercials. I was rooting for Jeepers to kill them quickly because it was a small mercy.

There is no terror or suspense in this so called horror at all. They transformed the once menacing and scary Jeeper genre into something boring and uninteresting.

In the prior movies you could feel the terror and dread of the unfortunate hunted. In this reboot I felt nothing of the sort. They turned Jeepers into another lame two bit monsters found in your typical generic Netflix horror movie.

I wouldn't recommend this movie. I was more entertained writing this review than watching the movie.

review_title: Not as bad as I thought
review_detailed_main: Jeepers creepers reborn is not a great movie but it's not a bad one either . Sure the creeper isn't as powerful as it was in the previous 3 movies but then again it's kind of creepy. I don't understand why do many reviews have one star . No this is not a robo review I'm a flesh and blood person and fan of the first two creepers movies. Part 3 not so much. Dee Wallace and Gary Graham guest star in the beginning of the movie. The horror cosplay convention is a nice touch. The creeper make up effects are not as good as the previous movies. But I was on a mission to watch for myself and my standards are not very high. I enjoyed Halloween ends and the munsters movie while most dismissed both movies . Jeepers creepers reborn was in the theater the same time as Barbarian which was a more superior horror movie, then it was pulled from the theater . I caught it on demand and I was surprised.

Thought the start with the two old folks was joke about cgi, bad actors etc. Which it kinda was

But then they just "Let me show you how bad cgi, acting and story can get"

I believe they spent their entire budget on fancy cars, but then forgot to put money on cgi or acting.

Watching the movie, I almost wanted back to the start, because that was tolerable at least.

1. Acting was extremely weak, I don't know why but felt like they were in drama class and the teacher said "Act this way" and they guessed what emotions are.

2. Cgi is..... I don't even know it's so bad that first cgi ever made is better and they use it often as well, when it's clear it's cgi 3. Story - No

Was it a horror? No Was it horror for my brain? Yes as my brain wanted to literally escape from how bad this was

Director and whoever signed off on this shouldn't be allowed on a movie set anymore.

review_title: Run far away from this movie! Now!
review_detailed_main:
The premise behind the other Jeepers Creepers movies was already a little bizarre- but the movies to me delivered a fun watch! The creeper was; well creepy and the films had some great actors and moments.

I was looking forward to seeing the new 4th instalment of the franchise.

Sadly- this movie was absolutely terrible. I was bored to tears in 20 min- the creeper looks silly and not scary like it's predecessor. The CGI bizarre background effects are so cheesy and awful looking, the story is far more bizarre and totally not in line with the others so it makes zero sense! Ugh! When re-doing a franchise you have to really bring your "A" Game- this movie didn't and then some.

Run far away from this movie!

review_title: Wow. Worst movie at its finest
review_detailed_main: I have seen so many bad movies that make you cringe while watching, make you uncomfortable amd embarrassed for the actors and director, but this is by far the worst movie ever. I'm not even sure where to start. The story line starts off terribly. I mean come on, nor everyone can be original but can you at least have a brain to not try to be something it's not. This kind of movie has me constantly thinking that I could grab my home video camera and do something so much greater than this garbage. Some might think I'm kidding but I'm not.. if any one movie could give me inspiration to direct a movie it would be this cuz anyone with a brain could make a better movie. The director should never ever get a chance to make a movie or have a budget after this garbage. It's sad that people like this director even gets a shot at making a movie for us to watch. I have seen so many bad movies but this by far is worst movie I have ever seen. I saw the imdb rating at 2.5. How is that even possible!?? It means there were a few that rated it over 2.. those people clearly have never seen a movie in their lifetimes. This was bad.

It is hard to believe that adults have actually created this mess. The only interesting thing in this movie is how the quality continues to decline.

We actually do get some decent shots of the environment in the beginning but maybe those only stand out because the rest of the movie look so terrible in comparison. I mean sometimes it seemed like they just edited stuff into the picture for fun. The CGI was really bad - it made the whole thing look like a school project.

Theres not much positive to say about this movie. The storyline was extremely simple and the acting was very poor. All in all a shockingly bad movie.

This was one of the best creature horror franchise. Had hope that they would bring back it's true respect in this instalment after the last one(which is far superior to this one now).

But all they did is destroy everything about the franchise: now all we can hope is for a new instalment which probably won't come out after another 23 years.

The creators of this one should be banned from making more movies, especially recreating epic movies like Jeepers Creepers.

Hope Jonathan Breck and the whole original team returns to make the real sequel. It will be a blessing for us fans and we will be ever thankful.

I have never in my life left a review on a movie but me and my husband just finished watching it. PEOPLE I am begging you do not watch this movie. DO NOT WASTE YOUR TIME. Do you have a movie you absolutely hate? Go watch that instead. I wish I could get a refund and get that time back. A high schoolers movie is better than this. The acting was absolutely horrible. Creeper looked like crap literally. We have advanced too much for this to have been this bad of a movie.

I had to leave this review to try to save someone for being mad and wasting their time on this movie. Please choose something else!! Lol.

If they did t have the Jeepers Creeper IP title, this script would have never seen the light of day. The script is trash, the acting is mostly horrid, the cinematography is basically 90s greens screen with an iMovie sci fi filter added in post and direction is horrible.

Characters act unbelievable and argue with each other just to add fabricated conflict. I'm shocked this movie was 1) made 2) had a theatrical release 3) somehow exists.

I'm wondering if the script was actually written by A. I. and if it was then I'd give it an additional star, but the idea a living human being put this to page is just lackluster and pretty appalling. Imagine trees being cut down to print out even just the sides for auditions is offensive alone. Glad to see most of the auditions were done via Zoom so less pages printed.

I'm surprised to see they had to shoot in three different t countries to made this awful movie since it all looked like to it could have been don't in a YouTuber's "studio" with a green back drop.

Character don't act like human beings and the writer should be ashamed this is what they turned in. It's like a scab writer crossed picket lines so the producers had something to churn out like chum.

Avoid at all costs.

This was a good movie. I don't understand the low ratings at all. I think the lower ratings are very misleading. This movie is good. While it isn't as good as the first and second movie in terms of development and plot and and storyline, it is a jeepers creepers movie. I like the angle that they use based on the location being in Louisiana they do stay true to that area and I like the lead characters I like the supporting characters I think it works well. I did like the jeepers creepers with the high school team in the bus and then getting picked off one by one that was cool. This one was kind of in the same vein, but it had a lot of modern elements to it. And included cosplay and included raves I guess and it was kind of you know around the Halloween dress up theme. I think if you're looking for something entertaining to watch and you have a little bit of time to watch it because the movie is not that long. I think the movie could have been another 30 minutes longer but That's not really a big deal. There was something at the end of the movie that I have questions about which wasn't answered and I think that's the only flaw that I really found but you know it has elements of Sex appeal in there which is nice, and the creeper is pretty much the same as he was in the first couple movies. It is definitely better than the third one in my opinion , so don't not watch this movie based on the bad reviews see it for yourself have fun with it because it's better than a bunch of horror movies that are out there on Amazon, prime and Netflix.

This is one of those terribly made films that become good for its mediocre. Have never seen so many people walk out of the cinema mid movie.

Character development was so awful that I couldn't care who lives or dies because it became so meaningless. Furthermore animation felt very off as if it were made by Windows Movie Maker. Save your money and support those blockbusters that actually try.

Horror is ment to inspire creativity and intrigue movie goers and this film archived none of those boxes. How the production got funding for this idea I will never know nor care due to the lack of effort,

Well this movie was terrible. I didn't read any reviews or even watch the trailer for this movie. I just decided on movie night to watch this and let's just say it was a complete disappointment. The creeper was awful. I don't know how the first movie was just so good and this was just so bad so I looked up the movies. The first 3 had the same director and actor playing the creeper. This 4th movie had a different director and a different actor playing the creeper. I kinda figured that the creeper was not the same actor when he waved at one of his victims. The actors were bad too. This could of been a youtube video. I wouldn't bother watching. It wasnt even ok. I was pissed that i didn't read reviews before ruining my evening with this garbage!!!

review_title: Garbage wouldn't quite sum up this film
review_detailed_main:
What an absolutely horrendous film, the acting is so unbelievable, it is laughable at most times. The script and vfx are absolute trash, whoever gave the go ahead for this film to be made, needs a solid knock on the head. I wish I could unsee and un spend the time spent on this steaming pile of dung.

Its honestly shocking to see such a cult beloved franchise take such a wrong turn (yes, pun intended). This film has somehow even managed to screw up the gore we are familiar with in this series. Seriously, where the hell did the resources in this film go? Everything seems like it was a rush job done by interns worried about being reprimanded, youtube has finer content of higher quality than this studio production film.

Do yourself a favour and never watch this.

Possibly one of the worst sequels to a popular horror movie series. Everything is awful. The actors, the effects, the sets, the costumes, the story, even the Creeper (how can you make a Jeepers Creepers movie and don't even get the Creeper right?!)...

I was already sceptical when I watched the trailer for this, but the trailer is a masterpiece compared to the acutal movie.

The first Jeepers Creepers movie is a horror film classic. The two sequels aren't as good, but still somewhat enjoyable. However, everyone involved in making this piece of garbage should be ashamed.

It's like they picked a random person from the streets who has never done a movie or even seen one, to write and direct it. They put in the least possible effort to get a theatrical release.

I don't recommend it at all. It's just a cheap cash grab and it doesn't even try to hide it. They should pay everyone who saw it a compensation for wasting their time.

Want my money back. A complete pile of rubbish. All this was/is to squeeze that last penny out of a sunk franchise. Very cheap film, no thought put into the movie. I mean how bad could it be.. it's that bad. It's like they ran out of ideas, which is a Pitty. As this could have been a good film. I'm guessing the creeper is 1000's of years old. Just go back. And see how people dealt with him or not, yum yum. Thousand years ago. Or even a film around the person who first discovered the flying monster. There are endless stories to go for. But no.. we got this. How anyone signed off on this movie must be absent minded when it comes to the Creeper.

review_title: Wait, so, this ISN'T a spoof movie?!
review_detailed_main: The entire movie from start to finish was as laughable as any comedy I've seen. The whole thing seemed satire, like a spoof movie, similar to Scary Movie, but like it was making fun of the original Jeepers Creepers movies, which were absolute bangers. I got second hand embarrassment from this just thinking about the fact that somebody had to come up with this and make it into a movie. I do however, love how the creeper developed new abilities while hibernating over the years, more specifically the dog whistle ability. I scream laughed when he did that. The acting was genuinely terrible, and everything jeepers Creepers did to be scary was actually funny. I've never laughed through a horror movie until now. Also, the fact that he was called the creeper had me ROLLING. But all in all I'm salty this movie was created because it's like a stain on the original movie 😭 don't watch unless you want to be annoyed by the stupidity of the movie and the garbage acting and all the wtf moments, there's a lot of those.

Has to be one of the worse movies I had to sit through, ever. The story line is crud, the acting is cringey and embarrassing, and overall... I wasted $6.99. The predictability of the script is true to form with the unimaginative skills of it writers, and who knows what the director was doing during filming. Nothing flows in the whole of the film that gives you to be invested in it. Characters are unapproachable as the viewer and so you sit and go back to playing solitaire on your phone. It's an insult really to those who enjoy horror films. Don't Bother Wasting your Time and Money on this film.

There are a plethora of better ways to waste your time than watching this movie. 5 million dollar budget was never going to cut for a sequel like this. With all due respect the CGI and dialogue are simply insufferable. It doesn't help that there is absolutely no character development so we don't care about any of the leads. There's absolutely nothing good about this movie. The Creeper looks like absolute dog s*** , for that they could've hired my 12 cousin with his paint brush. It was truly a chore to get through this movie and my IQ test scores haven't been the same since. We didn't go into it expecting much but we were left with nothing; a lackluster, sloppy , and lazy attempt to recapture the audience of an iconic original.

review_title: Not as bad as people are saying
review_detailed_main: Now, this movie has its mistakes and lazy plot, it doesn't bother to really introduce anyone and has some weird moments, but it's not as bad as 3, I love the new creeper, he's better then the original, especially since the original actor got away with touching kids. This is probably not as good as 2 but it would've been had it not been for the botched ending, it felt like they didn't know how to end it and the budget seemed to drop right at the end, but non the less, better then people are saying. It was fun, just left you wanting more. But just watch it for yourself, the internet will read reviews and not even open their mind to things, it happens all the time, a popular popular person's opinion decides others opinions. I think this movie needed to happen with how the original actor is a CM. But not nearly as bad as people are saying.

The first 2 movies were amazing and hits but with every popular slasher there is always the Crappy Cashgrab Movie; This is one of them along with JK3 (Not as Bad) They should've keep his original Design tbh, now he just looks unoriginal like Freddy Kruger as a Demonic Human like vampire, I thought just cause everyone hates it doesn't mean I will, but I did. The acting was ok but I didn't really care cuz it was like the best part of the movie 😭 The Gore was Decent, but it was Clique, They made him seem unscary, weak and just killing like he felt like it unlike the first couple movies Dont watch.

This is definitely one movie that shouldn't have been made and a movie line that should have stopped at after the first one. The story line was so far from the original that it gave it a bad name. The whole cast was forgettable and annoying. The best part and acting in the movie was the first 5 mins after that it was all down hill ..... and it was a steep hill to say the least. Even the "Creeper" looked tiny in appearance and was absent from a good 3/4 of the movie and when he was present it didn't help much. I just about forgot what the movie was about with the long periods of time that Mr. Creeper was absent. This one was a pass and don't look back !

I literally created an account just to I could write this review of how abysmal this movie was !

Worst acting...worst cgi...worst writing... worst everything actually !!

So extremely disappointing 😱 The creeper looked ridiculous! I have no clue what the "story line" was supposed to be if there even was one.

What an utterly complete waste of everyone's time and money, my money and the movie companies money and the airtime on tv commercials money .. anyway... do not waist your money or time to watch this train wreck ! Not at the movies or on tv if it ever makes it to some F rated tv channel.

Just like in other peoples reviews mentioning people were leaving the theater within first 20-30 minutes, likewise people were walking out of the movie theater at my theater as well.

I paid to take four of my oldest grandkids and I wish I could get that 90$ back, as soon as we walked out of the theater all 4 of my grandkids said same thing that was a terrible movie!

This movie was so bad it made me create an IMDb so I can leave this review.. The acting is bad, the cgi is trash, and overall plot is eh. More like a comedy instead of a horror. Don't see how some people are rating it above a 3. I'm glad they didn't bring back Jonathan Breck as the creeper cause it would of ruined his legacy in the previous films, yeah jeepers creepers 3 wasn't all that but it's better than this movie.. Even jeepers creepers fans will have trouble defending this, I think this was the last hope for the franchise . Hopefully someone comes along and saves it because the Creeper is too good of a horror icon to let go to waste. Just make a decent origin story dammit!!

review_title: Oh this is bad , and not even bad it's good just absolute trash
review_detailed_main:
So firstly I'm not a movie prude I enjoy all kinds of weird and wonderful movies , and with the jeepers creepers movies I have never thought they were that great anyways so it's not like there's a bias .

I thought the first was great until you actually see the creeper then the police station scene was great . The 2nd one I thought it became a parody of itself but was hokey fun the 3rd was just plain awful

But this one oh dear , the acting , screen play , special effects ,story ,script everything about it is abysmal , I saw reviews and thought maybe people just don't like changes to their beloved franchise and honestly the first 10 minutes of the movie I thought well ok this is actually pretty good even though without saying there was a major change to a certain something that's pretty obvious to spot that had me scratching my head but overall I thought no I like this .......then the plot reveals itself and I rolled my eyes and it's like the budget and ideas ended there because from there it's like a completely different production team entered . It is so stomach churningly cringeful after every step of the way .

I can't count how many times I rolled my eyes or made audible comments like oh wow or oh dear this is awful throughout the movie .

I can't even explain how low level this is , it's like a really awful low budget kids TV show bad like the worse episode of goosebumps would look like the Shawshank redemption .

3 was bad like really bad but honestly that's like a Oscar masterpiece compared to this and that's not exaggerating, I really really can't express how bad it is , even movies that are intentionally made bad like camel spiders , sharknado, or those awful straight to dvd movies like transmorphers or mega shark versus super underpants it is genuinly worse than any of those even uwe boll movies stand head and shoulders above this .

I'd say props to the male lead as he obviously is trying his hardest to show some level of acting but no this is one stinky turd that needs flushing and forgetting.

This is the worst jeepers creepers movie i ever seen , i dont how high u need to be to come with such miserable idea, and ruin such a beautiful franchise as jeepers creepers. I hope I can wake up next morning and forget it that The jeepers creepers has not released new movie. The acting the idea and the graphics are so horrible It makes you wanna leave fast. Even the jeepers creepers himself looks horrible like they order him from AliExpress. I hope nobody will watch this movie and they will remove it once and forever, because it's really a shame to watch such a movie with such a good name.

Thanks.

review_title: I would rather watch a low budget X rated home video from the 70's
review_detailed_main:
Where to start?!

acting? Atrocious!


characters? Non existent!


script? Horrible!
















... complete with subpar camera work

Honestly, the only horrifying thing about this "horror" is its existence.

What a way to wreck another franchise, by turning it into a collection of all the known movie sins.

Spare yourself the pain of watching this sell out of a soulless failed money grab.

I would rather watch a low budget X rated home video from the 70's... written, directed and produced by Harvey Weinstein and Bill Cosby; that would at least be honesty terrifying.

review_title: The Creeper looks like a dummy
review_detailed_main: What the heck is this?!!! I thought it was suppose to be a comeback from the recent horrible sequel. It only worst! It's a joke! The intro gave its original feels until it turns out to be a movie? Everything looks very green screen and cgi is so cheap. Not gonna blame the actor cause obviously they are directed. Everything dark and fake. The kills looks tacky. The whole idea of human form of creeper? Not to get me started by the look and act of creeper, he's so dark? His love and classic look of creeper is entirely gone! Obviously not the original cast. Man worst movie of the year. Let's just be happy the original 2 always gonna be here but just no more! Leave it alone now.

I didn't mind this movie. Was entertaining. Better than "Smile". Half the horror movies today are garbage. "Nope" was bulls&$t compared to this. All the people giving this 1. I'm not sure what you're really looking for in todays day and age. Yes the CGI was brutal. Yes some of the acting was brutal. But tell me what movie today in the horror genre has good acting.... Let alone good CGI.... I wouldn't mind seeing another one after this for jokes. But somehow I doubt it with the ratings this is getting today. The main actor was east on the eyes.. made me give it a 7/10 :). And now all I'm doing is babbling to fill up the review!!!!

review_title: Whoever wrote and directed this should have their peepers removed
review_detailed_main:
When I saw the rating for this I thought this can't be right. But it was even worse than the third one. It was so bad that the owners of the original Jeepers song didn't have it on this version. The FX was bad...I mean 1980s bad. You could see some fuzziness at times around the people as they stood in front of the green screen.

Let's start with the cast, first they had to do the traditional white girl dating black guy. In the beginning I used to say people were too whiny about this trope but they have a point, it is used way too much. Second, the woman looked old with makeup to cover it, I looked up her ag and she is only about 30 so she has a rough old age coming. She was not believable as a "scientist", which was something they had to remind us of. She was barely able to act. The boyfriend...Well, what can I say except they made him out to be a comic book nerd. There was no compatibility to try and believe they were dating, let alone in love. I am betting if anything they barely got along on the set. The Jeepers creature was bad. It looked like a body suit instead of adding color and other things to the skin. He wouldn't be able to eat anything since I don't think I ever saw his mouth open wide enough to get anything past his fake teeth. The rest of the fillers were just pathetic stereotypes.

There was no dread or scariness like it was in past movies. It felt more like a stalker killing people then some supernatural demon. There was no scariness to the movie. Remove the blood and you could show this to kids. In previous Jeepers movie there was a feeling of scariness in the film.

The ending was the worst...Cops pull up to the house because? Who knows why they show up but the green screen really stood out. The cops get out of the car with guns drawn at the survivors, why? But then after 5 seconds they put them away and simply sit them in the seat of the car, why? They went from threat to victim in 5 seconds with not a word said. The worst actor was supposedly the one with the most acting credits. Either the makeup team did her no favors or she is going to look 60 when she hits 40. Oh and just a small irritation...Why do so many wear tiny dress with combat boot looking shoes?

This is not your original Jeepers Creepers. Usually they try and reverse a bad course after a bad installment (Jeepers 3) but this one looked like they wanted to compete with Jeepers 3 for worst and tadah...they won. Skip it if you do not want to ruin the franchise. You know how bad this reminds me? It remind me of Jaws 4. You know the one...It was the one where the shark checked online to see where its prey had booked a vacation and was able to follow them from the USA to the Bahamas.

review_title: Who walks a mile to take a piss in the woods
review_detailed_main: I paid $14 to add this trash to my collection. From the start of the movie you can tell this is going to be trash. It was so bad I couldn't stop watching just wondering how much worser it was going to get. The acting was just as miserable as the relationship. After the original keepers creepers I've always wondered if there would be another one just as good. Unfortunately this one failed entirely and considering the budget, if the story line was half decent, this might have actually went somewhere. It's unfortunate I wasted my time and money on this trash, but highly rewarding considering how bad it is that it's worth a watch just to be screaming at the TV.

The only part of this movie that feels like a Jeepers Creepers movie is the opening with Dee Wallace. Everything after that feels like a fan film where everyone is just "doing their best" with equipment on loan from the college AV department.

The effects are shoddy at best. The exterior backdrop is clearly green screen with no blending between layers. The outside shots were clearly filmed during daylight and color corrected (poorly) to look like night time.

If the writing had been good, I could have overlooked the effects. But the writing wasn't good.

They kept trying to push some mystical/psychic/voodoo story line, but couldn't be bothered to explain it or flesh it out enough for it to make sense in the context of the movie.

The characters have a terrible habit of knowing nothing then knowing everything and sometimes in the same scene.

This was clearly just an attempt at a cash grab.

review_title: I'm giving a 1 and that's being generous.
review_detailed_main: Only cause I can't leave anything lower. The actors/actresses, just change careers. Whoever wrote this, do the same. You took a classic and completely destroyed it. Watching this film was cringing/brutally butchered. None of these people have businesses in the film industry. From horrible jokes, punch lines, I could easily go on. This film should never have existed & I feel pity for whoever was talked into funding this. For the past years, I've seen every film and grew up like many of us did. Watching these films. People get ideas in their head to reboot these topics & while some are successful. Some come up short & in this case, not at all.

Movie starts off good but 10 mins in and already the male lead is CLEARLY overacting and the editing/ vfx seems to be so unprofessional, no story build and little to no character development.

After watching I was so disappointed that considered it a waste of time.

The male lead starts and finishes off as a over enthusiast 6th grader obsessed about his girlfriend and making everything he does seem so unnatural and forced; overacting at its best (sarcasm implied)

I would not recommend watching this as the makers did not even put effort in vfx/ editing when remaking a movie series. Overall bad experience.

Bad green screen, bad special effects, mediocre British actors doing TERRIBLE southern American accents. Don't be fooled by the opening sequence with legend Dee Wallace because that's the best acting and set piece you'll see in the entire movie. Additionally, the two leads have ZERO chemistry, not sure why they're together. The girl was annoyed by the boyfriend's passion for horror and cryptozoology and made certain he knew it regularly. 🙄

In this rendition, the Creeper is basically a human with wings. Long gone are the amazing stunts and wire work that gave the Creeper supernatural movement. Now, he just runs around a mansion while grounded.

Speaking of the Creeper, the new design is terrible. Looks more like the alien in Enemy Mine than anything resembling the Creeper. 👎👎

I am a Creeper fan and i have to say this is the worst movie i have saw in years. I can not believe it was this bad. Poor graphics, acting, and plot. In addition, the director took five minutes at the beginning of the movie to tell you how hard and all the obstacles they had to go thru to make this movie. I was not expecting a cinema masterpiece because you know its Jeepers Creepers, but i was expecting somewhat good graphics and a plot. You can tell the director struggled at the beginning of the movie just to throw stupid content in to make the movie over an hour long. I would not even recommend watching this movie for free!!!!

They have absolutely butchered this franchise probably beyond repair, the first 2 films are fantastic horror movies while 3 and 4 are terrible.

It hurts to see the Jeepers Creepers franchise in this condition as the first film is one of my all time favourite horror films, but we're to begin with this? First off the acting is atrocious beyond laughable. This film has possibly the worst use of green screen I've ever seen, you would think this film was made on a budget of a penny. But this films biggest crime is the creeper himself, what have they done! The creeper was a horror icon from the first 2 films but they decided to basically change his entire look for this.

To sum up, don't waste your time or money on this rubbish. If they make another Jeepers Creepers film and after this I doubt they will, but if they do they need to do much much better.

review_title: Not perfect, but not awful either!
I want to put chlorine in my eyes
review_detailed_main:
You know what's worse than this movie? Nothing

This film has a exeptionally Poor story line, I have no idea how the creeper is alive, where he came from or how he got there. What happened in the last 23 years? I guess we will never know..

The acting is horrendous, the cgi is constant and atrocious. The plot was just as bad, the whole theme of the horror film...I just don't have words

I never liked the third one and they just seem to be getting worse. Rather aquire a proper budget and get some real props like in the first and second one.

If you watch this and enjoyed it I feel sorry for you and anyone who knows you.

review_title: Spectacularly Rotten. And now the BAD news
review_detailed_main:
The bad news is that it's not only one of the worst movies ever made, but that it hijacks the name and "story" of one of the greatest horror/fantasy/supernatural films ever made. And that is artistically unforgivable. A lazy, uninspired knock-off that all involved should take off their film CV's as fast as they can.

Naturally, the original brilliant writer/director, Victor Salva, had absolutely NOTHING to do with this abomination. And it shows!

As far as criticism, I don't know where to begin. Between the awful story, the intensely unrealistic and cringe dialog, the ultra cheap production values and most unlikable cast of bad, first time actors ever assembled, it's also one of the most poorly directed films you'll ever suffer through. Ever!

Obviously this piece of movie garbage was a cash grab, using the franchise name, and hoping to get out with a profit.

I could go on with how deeply flawed this movie was but, like watching it, it's simply not worth my time- or yours. Avoid this disaster at all costs.

I swear I could have directed a much better film and I have zero experience. The writing, directing, acting, costumes, and effects are all akin to a midterm film school project. I doubt such a poorly thrown together piece would receive a passing grade, even from the most lenient professor. None of the characters have a backstory, so there's no way to relate to them or form any attachment. Random strangers meet more strangers, bad things happen, creepy people are acting creepy, and the Creeper puts on his worst performance to date. JC3 was a masterpiece compared to this. JC: Reborn may have irreparably damaged one of the best, and most unique, horror movie creatures of all time. The story and effects are locked into a downward trend from beginning to end, the film is reminiscent of a 2005 straight-to-DVD movie by the time the credits roll - I've seen Zoom meetings with better virtual backgrounds. I will definitely be avoiding any films that these writers and directors touch moving forward. Maybe this movie can eat a few good movies and be reborn into something worth our time in the future.

review_title: A zero rating wasn't an option..

review_detailed_main:
Let's keep it simple: low budget, bad acting, corny, not scary, and over half the move is CLEARLY filmed in front of a green screen.

What a bummer because I was really looking forward this movie, because the preview looked great. This movie had potential but in the end it was a complete Waste of time.

The idea of a circus theme was creative but disappointed huge. I think In the hands of the right director/producer and a better budget, this movie could have been good.

I liked that my teenagers could watch it and it was tastefully done...meaning no sex scenes, so that was a plus.

Over all this was a poorly made film.

There's nothing redeeming about this movie.

At all.

Everyone involved should be ashamed to have put this disaster out. The acting is so bad that you'll find yourself wondering why and how you decided to invest your valuable time by turning this on. It's a gigantic cringe-fest every time someone opens their mouth and speaks.

The Creeper isn't scary in this entry.

He was terrifying in the first two films but they make him out to be a joke in one. He's almost like, a guy who you run into at a horror convention, in cosplay, dressed as The Creeper. You know who he's supposed to be but, in the end, it's not really him.

Also, I hate bad CGI. However, for straight to video B-movie horror, I can let a little bit slide. Unfortunately, its completely impossible to do that with this film because 80% of the films settings and backgrounds are on a green screen. It's laughable, honestly. There is a shot in the beginning of the movie where a character pulls over to the side of the road and gets out of the car running and It looks as if she's running directly into the LAND OF CGI.

Avoid this film. Even if it's free.

Absolutely awful The cgi was appalling and the creeper looked like he was ordered from wish.

It would've served better to call it a spoof of jeepers creepers because then at least people wouldn't be expecting a horror movie the scariest thing in this was the *ahem* 'acting' and lack of a full storyline For any character It's a full 88 minutes of my time and some money that will never get back tho I would pay double to never have to watch this nonsense ever again given that the film has been waited on and hyped up for so long it's amazing how terrible it was As always each to their own but honestly wait till it's free and you want a good laugh before falling asleep.

Any fan of the originals will be deeply disappointed in this pile of garbage, it should never have been given the go ahead.

It's like a bad counterfeit version and should be stricken from the records!!

Acting is sub par and they don't even have Jonathan Breck as the Creeper!! The plot is all there it's just poorly executed, one would think they Vet movies before release , as it is a bit of a slap in the face to the other films which has its fair share of a Cult following. I think it's fair to say that this franchise is definitely over.

I think the only way this franchise can be saved now is a complete reboot, but they need Jonathan Breck back, cause let's face it...... he is the creeper!

review_title: Worst movie in the history of movies
review_detailed_main:
Ooh boy.

Imagine, if you will, it's the first week of a new semester. A film school professor, assigns a project to a group of first year film students. She tasks them with making a Jeepers Creepers sequel. The students, (who happen to be at the bottom of their class), have never seen the first 3 movies; in fact, these students had never actually watched a horror movie before. The professor provides a general description of the creature and the plot and leaves them to their own devices. This would be the result. I've watched quite a few horror stinkers, but jeepers creepers, this one is the absolute worst I've ever seen.

review_title: Jeepers, Creepers, Where'd you get so awful?
review_detailed_main:
This movie was just terrible, I can't believe I spent hours of my life watching this garbage, what was good about the original was that it was actually scary and had golden storytelling, but this, just turns it into garbage.

I don't recommend, I want to give it a 0, but that's not a valid option in IMBD, Just, Please for goodness sake! Don't watch this piece of garbage!

What was good about the first one was that the movie was actually scary, all goes for the second one too. When I watched this current movie, I was just starring at this movie with a blank face, it just wasn't that scary. I don't want to spoil this movie but, for the sake of the lord, PLEASE YOU SHOULDN'T WATCH THIS.

By far the worst movie I've seen!! Totally disappointed me from the beginning. Jeepers was my scariest Vilian now it just took all that fear away, don't waste time or money. We gave it a chance and finished the movie but it just got worst and worst. In Spanish like my daughter says " Traga" meaning trash!!!!! The entire plot was bad, I remember jeepers killing for the skin to make a body form. Take the people kill them dump them in the shoot and do it again!! Like it was just bad!! Oh let's not talk about the makeup!!!! His fave wasn't even scary like the other one! I remember just by looking at the face I got chills!! It was just bad.

This movie has to be a joke !! This is the worst movie reboot ever and I mean ever like who thought this was okay ? You will never get a Hollywood star this movie is atrocious we want the old team back. Jeepers creepers 1, 2 and 3 was okay but this will never be okay!! Thanks for ruining our hopes we have waited years upon years for a new Jeepers creepers movie and this is what we get ? Heavy cgi no context just straight garbage I speak for everyone when I say this was a BIIIIG DISAPPOINTMENT I WOULD PERSONALLY LIKE TO SPEAK TO THE DIRECTOR ATP HE MUST GET FIRED OR RETIRE BECAUSE THIS IS HORRIBLE.

review_title: If you are a fan of Jeepers Creepers please dont!
review_detailed_main:
You cannot unwatch what you watch and probably cannot be deleted from your mind if you are fan of the original films. I thought Jeepers Creepers 3 was the worst but they managed to do worse than that.

Make up, practical effects, special effects, CGI: 0.5/10 Poor writing, bad acting, effects that bring pain to your eyes, bad redesign of the Creeper. It's all there.

While watching I asked my self: "This is how some movies are when they are shot with an iPhone?" Finishing the movie I can safely say that it was shot on a Nokia 3310. Let's hope that this is the last we see of this franchise because nobody is taking it serious anymore.

I cannot believe someone will pay to watch this atrocity at the cinemas. Watch at your own risk.

review_title: The worst Jeepers Creepers movie of the franchise
review_detailed_main: I actually can't believe I paid money to go see this absolute piece of trash that they're trying to call a horror movie, they chose two British actors two play the main characters, they couldn't even pull an American accent off if they tried, you could tell they pretty much used CGI for the movie, the acting was terrible, nearly everything looked fake & the new director just ruined a movie. Worst horror movie of my life. They should of brought in the original director & the original actor to play the creeper, this movie makes the third one look pretty good & I thought the third one was bad, but this one is something else & not in a good way.

The first, second and third Jeepers Creepers were good films but somebody somewhere drop the entire ball on this one. The story plot was just horrible along with terrible acting. They changed the Creeper tremendously and made him look unrealistic. This is by far the worst movie of 2022 and should be redone and bring all the survivors from the first three movies to fight the Creeper one last time, doing this would have made a big difference. This movie was down right Terrible and a huge disappointment. Please don't waste your time or money because even if this movie was for rent for only a dollar, I still wouldn't pay I would rather buy candy for a dollar instead.

review_title: I wish I could give a negative score
review_detailed_main: This was the worst movie. Terrible acting, script, makeup and story. I wish I could get the time wasted watching this movie back. I cannot get over the creeper not even looking like the original. Makes no sense. I loved the first one so much. Truly terrifying at the time. Now this movie has managed to spoil how good the first was. Who signed off to make this? Like who thought this was a good idea? I really wanted to give it a chance hoping beyond hope that it would at least not be as bad as the third one. The third was bad enough. This movie doesn't even seem part of the sane franchise other than the name.

Wow where to start such a terrible film. If you think part 3 is bad wait till you watch this mess. Acting absolutely terrible. Such a shame first 2 films were so good. I can't believe I wasted 80+ minutes of my life watching this garbage. The cgi was awful looked so fake was laughable. The writers should be ashamed of themselves the script is terrible and all the stupid cult stuff was not needed and the guy who played the creeper was awful why not bring back Jonathan breck he was so good as the creeper. Also what was with that scream the creeper kept doing he never done it in any of the other films why add that in now in a movie that was set in between the other movies. Just bad so so bad.

Definitely rating 1/10. This was probably the worst movie I have ever seen in the 23 years of my life. Whoever directed this needs to go back to film school. I came into the movie 30 minutes late but I'm glad I did. I started watching at the part where they won the prize at the festival and from then I should've known. "Jeepers Creepers" didnt even look scary to me. Please dont get me started on the acting! It seems as if they casted strangers off the street and threw them into this film. The story line didn't even make sense. This movie was so fast paced, you couldn't even analyze it. Very corny and low budgeted.

None of these people here does not have any idea of horror movie acting specially chase is like a baby . Actually the director and actors have seriously damaged the original jeepers creepers reputation. Rubbish copy story and nothing new. Jeepers creepers must protect its patent from this nonsense. I wish I could give 0 star. All the jeepers creepers fan were expecting a high quality movie , making this garbage, slapping on fan face. Definitely there is no horror element, just full of cheap third class drama . Avoid these actor and director in future. Whoever watches this will definitely regret because of wasting time and money.

review_title: Why would they do this to the Creeper?
review_detailed_main: This was an absolute waste of money. They RUINED the Creeper, his face was ridiculous with a nose that was unimaginably large. His body structure was scrawny and short, he looked absolutely NOTHING LIKE THE ORIGINAL. The CGI looks like some B movie disaster with the green screen scenes and ridiculous effects. They didn't even get the vehicle correct. Lifelong fans of this franchise are absolutely disgusted by this pitiful attempt at the movie. After waiting years for another this was the worst possible result. If you thought part 3 was bad you haven't seen anything remotely bad because compared to this atrocity number 3 is award worthy.

The first two films in this franchise were great! The third was really bad, or at least I thought so. This one, however, makes the third one look like Casablanca. It's devoid of any story or redeeming qualities. The Creeper looks like a cheap Halloween costume. The worst part is it ended looking like yet another film is coming. They won't stop until they've squeezed every last cent out of this series. Please do yourself a favor and pass on this one. If we quit giving them our money maybe they'll quit producing this useless tripe. I do wanted a return to greatness for the Creeper but what I got what a huge waste of time and a disappointment.

I enjoyed 1 & 2 and 3 was ok but this addition to the "franchise" was definitely not needed. This move was oddly cast, poorly acted, and the storyline was BORING. I wasted money renting it. To top it all off, it's number one on iTunes rental for horror movies?!!! Honestly no need to waste an hour and a half. Images and shots of the creeper being reborn were cool but limited. They wasted a lot of time trying to build on a dumb storyline that never came together, I also didn't finish it so maybe it did come together but I don't really care what I may have may have missed. I wish there was an option to get a full or partial refund for a movie you didn't finish. Then maybe the amount of people who couldn't or didn't want to finish a movie would translate into a type of rating for people interested in spending 6$ on a rental.

review_title: The only thing killed in this movie is the series
review_detailed_main:
It's so stupid I can't see them making any more.

It's not scary. It's not funny. The leading man acts like he's in a Hallmark movie.

The festival of creeper fans is just the stupidest direction they could go in for the movie.

It has every horror stereotype with nothing special about it.

There's nobody to identify with. The acting is awful. The plot is stupid.

The first two were pretty good. Pretty damn good. The third was good enough you could feel some of what you felt from the previous two.

This one....this one....is soo much worse. It would almost be funny if it wasn't so lame and sad.

Stay away, unless you want to see the death of what was once a good franchise.

review_title: Why o why did i watch this 😒
review_detailed_main: This is the most god awful worst peace of woke garbage i have ever seen. Why who would ever pay to make this crap. I absolutely loved jeepers creepers 1 and 2 3 and now 4 have killed my love for horror. Suck is a understatement i hate this movie like. Hate she hulk snd the black mermaid. Stop with the woke bs and make better horror movies. Stick with the plot and maybe it would suck less. It doesn't even look like the jeepers creeper killer wtf i hate almost all remakes but this was by far the worst. I feel sorry for the next generation if this is the crap they will grow up watching. God its so bad o the horror.

review_title: Save yourself the 1 hour and 20 minutes and skip this
review_detailed_main: I wasted time in my life I will never get back watching this trash. They forced a interracial couple , which I have no problem with, on us that have 2 totally different personalities that make their pairing unbelievable considering the storyline. The whole movie you're asking "why" to things the characters are doing that both makes no sense and will cause their demise at the villans hands. For example, it starts my a older couple trying to get away from a truck driver only for them to double back to where they interrupted him dumping a body!?! A guy is about to propose to his pregnant wife yet start fawning over another female in her presence?

review_title: What on earth is going on in the house of commons?
review_detailed_main: When I heard the jeepers creepers was coming out I joke you not I was so hyped. I purposely didn't watch the trailer as I feel it spoils the movie. I loved the first 2, So I was absolutely buzzing for this one since they made the 3rd one disappointing. The first 15 mins of the movie something felt off. I was like hold on a minute. What on earth is going on??? All the green screen effects had me tripping. Honestly, I was in disbelief. It a shame that such a great movie name is tied to this movie. I implore you readers not to watch its just going to be disheartening to horror fans. Next time I will watch the trailer for a heads up.

I don't mind that this movie was terrible. I watch plenty of terrible movies, after all. So, that's not a game changer. What bothered me was that it was completely unaware of the fact that it was terrible.

This film mostly falls apart on the technical level. The effects are awful. The reaper looks bad. The sets looks almost cartoonish at times. There are segments of the film that make no sense in the larger whole. Outlandish decisions are made by characters without any sensible explanation being given as to why they would do something no sane, rational person would do. There are also sections which are atrociously and groan-worthily campy without being self-aware.

The only silver living in this movie is the actors. They're clearly doing their best with what they've been given. Also, Dee Wallace is a national treasure. She raises the quality of any film, even when she's only in it for 5 minutes (as in this one).

review_title: Not as bad as everyone says, but yeah...it's not good
review_detailed_main:
Well...that was disappointing. Where to begin my list of grievances? First, the run time appears to be even shorter than advertised, and everything felt really rushed. Mostly the dialogue was okay, but there was some really cringey bits. For example, one of their group was killed, and a member of the group, inspecting the corpse, remarks that the wounds were fresh. Well, they had seen their friend less than five minutes ago, so I'm not sure that was a necessary observation.

There was virtually no exposition, and the characters were remarkably uncurious about this demonic creature chasing them. The Creeper didn't act in a way consistent with prior established patterns. The plot to defeat the Creeper was ridiculous and required the group to know things they couldn't know, and anticipate the behaviors of a creature that they couldn't possibly anticipate, and for a regular girl with no training to pull off moves like a member of Seal Team 6 that also used to be a ninja. And it still required a huge amount of luck.

Honestly it felt like a group of high school students were given a decent budget and told to make a Jeepers Creepers movie. But only one of them had seen any of the prior installments, and he only sort of remembered the basics, but enough to get the gist of it.

I cannot believe how horrible this movie was they destroyed this movie and what the movie was supposed to be we need the old director back and writers and original creeper casted . This killed the franchise. Such a disappointment. The effects were horrible everything was just bad it was so bad it made me tear up because I was such a jeepers creepers fan and now my dreams are crushed to actually see how the creeper came about and how or if he will ever be killed , I thought it would of started off where part 2 ended and showing where he came from and trisha would be in the movie or something , just bury this own franchise now.

review_title: You have to enjoy b films!
review_detailed_main:
I'm only 15 minutes into this movie and it's already a complete train wreck.

Low budget. Bad FX, the dreaded green screen. The movie does the original such a disservice.

I think what happened is some dude was attending writing class and he was like a "Chad" and his teacher was trying to be supportive so every time he turned in an assignment she was really encouraging even though he was turning in hot garbage. Then one day she had an idea! "What if I give him a challenge?" And he said I wrote a screenplay based off of a dream I think my dog my have had last year!

And then we got this movie

THAT BEING SAID.

If you like B films (which are kinda my guilty pleasure) this is totally worth the ride.

2/10 as a film

10/10 as an experience.

review_title: There's no way to make a worse movie
review_detailed_main:
This movie was so bad I had to come back and fix my 2 and change it to a 1. Clearly only the cast voted this a 10.

The acting is abysmal, but the directing and videography are absolutely trash. Transitions seem to skip ahead minutes, and there doesn't seem to actually be a story or purpose to casted roles.

Additionally, YouTube channels have better visual effects. This is clearly green screen the entire time with poor lighting, and even worse acting unable to hide the fact. The funniest spots are running to and from the building. At one point the cops pull up and the lighting makes the green from the green screen actually appear.

This is so bad there's no point in giving it awards to signify that.

review_title: a few moments are okay but overall it's really bad
review_detailed_main:
Aha finally another Jeepers Creepers. Reborn as they say and after seen this one I thought what the hell.

It's not creepy at all and the monster fighting towards the end makes it even ridiculous. Story doesn't make any sense and the opening scene is hjust way to long and be honest, nothing happens. Okay, it's a bit like the movie Duel. A truck following a car but that's it.

Of course you have to see some blood and dripping blood is CGI and that's another thing that is really bad, the CGI, no time for grading in post-production makes the CGI turns awfull. And the sky is so CGI that it all becomes a strange ride.

Jeepers Creepers is another franchise that goes wrong after every entry. This here, one to forget.

Gore 0,5/5 Nudity 0/5 Effects 2/5 Story 1/5 Comedy 0/5.

review_title: Not much to it other than a nice intro.
review_detailed_main:
The first few minutes of "Jeepers Creepers Reborn" was surprisingly good for a movie with an overall score of 2.5. Gary Graham and Dee Wallace star in a harrowing intro...only to learn that it really doesn't have a lot to do with the movie. Suddenly you jump ahead and you see some guy getting murdered because he had the nerve to pee in the woods. In other words, folks are just there to be killed for our entertainment. The actual story begins even later and you see a young couple go to a weird sort of carnival where they win the grand prize...and a film crew follows them. But then it simply becomes a case of some psycho chasing them and the film crew in order to murder them. Ho, hum...

I am not a great person to judge many modern horror films because I think many modern horror films stink. They are just slasher films with no depth...and this one is no exception. There isn't much to the story apart from violence and the CGI isn't all that impressive either. Believe it or not, despite the gore, I was bored by the film...apart from the nice epilogue.

What a complete joke of a movie. This movie might set a record for trying to do things that make absolutely zero sense. Part Jeepers Creepers, part Texas Chainsaw, Part Saw but in the worst possible way. Obviously from the trailers we knew this was going to be a glorified Syfy Channel movie, but Sharknado looks like The Dark Knight compared to this pile of garbage.
