Literally zero good things came from this movie. It even made sure to get in it's mandatory Hollywood wokeness that ruins every movie these days. The lighting, special effects, acting, legit everything was laugh out loud terrible.

DO NOT SEE THIS MOVIE. You've been warned.

review_title: Lower rating than JC3? Now that's bad
review_detailed_main: Jeepers Creepers 1 & 2 are among my favorite horror movies. As is usually the case, all subsequent movies in a franchise just become comedy. It's sad. JC Reborn lacks all the things that made the first two movies great. Even the Creeper is poorly acted. The cast is not much better. The story had a chance by starting out prequel but, after leaving the past it loses its potential before segueing into the present. And how is it that the first two Jeepers Creepers (2001 & 2003) has much better CGI twenty years ago?! Too bad the Director didn't have the skill, motivation or money to make a movie that wouldn't be only memorable for just how bad it is.

I should've known that this movie would be bad since jeepers creepers 3 was horrible!!! I gave this movie a chance in hopes that they had gotten it right this time since they messed up so bad with the 3rd one. However they did not get it right this time either, this one sucked just as much as the last one!!!! Why not just leave the movie alone if you're going to keep making crappy remakes??? The beginning started off okay. I actually thought that the movie might be redeeming itself from the last jeepers creepers movie until I continued watching this crap!!! The acting sucked, the characters sucked, it just sucked!!! I really hope they don't make another one of these movies for crying out loud!!! I didn't even watch the movie to the end because it sucked that bad!!! Barffff!!!!

Spectacularly poor. This feels like an Asylum production. The acting is woeful, the 'plot' is atrocious and the 'Creeper' looks like he's from Party City. The whole movie is devoid of scares or anything even approaching a 'fright' and the whole thing is so poorly over-lit it's like watching a stage production. I'm sure with a fraction of talent behind the camera the budget for this movie could have been spent on a tightly scripted movie in the same vein as 'Duel' but instead we're left with something that feels like it's from the early noughties - slow mo, sparsely populated neon 'rave' scene included. Just dreadful.

This had no business being in theaters. The fact that it was a theatrical release puts it on the radar of far more "critics" than a VOD release. That's a nightmare for a genre that has, for the most part, been on a roll as of late.

Horror is constantly forced to prove itself; What have you done for me lately? Well, lately, "Pearl" came along and gave the genre a huge boost, critically. A week later, this trash comes out and does it's best to undo the progress.

I don't care that I wasted 90 minutes. I do care that those 90 minutes could effect the genre as well as the very idea of making sequels.

I'm a fan of the Jeepers Creepers movies, but OMG! Obvi the first one was the best but they just keep getting worse. There was nothing special or unique about this one. I waited for a long time to see this, but it was a snooze fest. It literally took me 3 times to get through this without falling asleep and I'm being totally serious. It's very typical of many movies out there. Nothing more than a B movie. I'm not sure what they were thinking when they made this movie, but it could have been so much better if they just put a little thought into it! As my title says, it's a disappointment. Watch at your own risk.

Ok, so Props for keeping horror genre alive, but this film is a complete quick money grab. It's almost as if it were made for TV. It feels super cheap. The original Jeepers Creepers, hell, even the second Jeepers creepers were scary and really entertaining. The acting decent enough and story engaging. This film has everything a bad movie should have. Bad acting, bad sets, no story. They took a great film and just added a played out kill by numbers, done a million times over element to it, in a old house set. I can't believe they released this movie and thought it was good. I paid $8 for this? Hollywood needs to refund my money.

Jeepers Creepers films get worse with each release! Time to stop churning out these Movies. Reborn was the worst and miles off original, no direction, no decent jump scares, no suspense. Hopefully we will not see another Jeepers Creepers film for a long time. If you are thinking about watching this movie due to seeing the other three, don't, it's a massive let down. Even the creeper looks plastic. The original was great, the next one not too bad, third not great and reborn sucks. Plot line was thin and they tried to use the Halloween season to add some spark but this could have worked but again it failed. Bringing voodoo in to the mix, again could have worked with the creeper but as previous poor writing let this idea go to waste. Not a film I will be watching again in a long while if at all and I'm a massive horror fan.

review_title: Pathetic, destroyed the nightmare of legendary JEEPERS CREEPER
review_detailed_main:
❗ CAUTION: Before u start watching the full movie, don't forget to check the trailer.

Pathetic storyline and CGI, destroyed the nightmare of legendary JEEPERS CREEPER series. Where is Victor Silva like to know his opinion if he take out his leisure time to watch this part of Reborn, then Vitor himself with reborn again.

I believe it is the WORST movie of 2022, i have seen till date. In first scene I though it will be some thing and at the end it is somewhere. Best part is Jeeper Creeper love to listen music and very week Jeeper killed so easily. Lol Worst Worst Worst Worst Worst Worst Worst Worst Worst Worst Worst Worst.

Such a horrible movie. Majority of the movie is basically just green screen. The acting is so horrible. It reminds me of this movie called "The Sand". Whoever decided to make another movie should've got the original Director and writer's.

Just like when they remade Friday the 13th and Nightmare on Elm Street; the ruined the franchise. Total waste of an hour and 20 minutes from my day. Honestly I like low budget horror movies but some are just completely awful. However allowed the script to be accepted or the pitch of the movie must not have tastes or good visions. Another reboot bites the dust on this one.

review_title: Don't watch it, you can't unsee the rubbish
review_detailed_main:
I mirror everything that's been said in other comments, I'm a huge fan of the three previous movies but this has ruined it for me. The acting is terrible, the creepers mask is an insult to the movies before, and don't get me started on the plot.

For anyone that hasn't seen it yet...don't.

This looks like something created by high school students for a class project, and the creeper looks like something my cat left in the litter box.

It's an insult to Victor Ronald Salva. Timo Vuorensola, Jake Seal and Sean-Michael Argo need to go back to film school, or just find another career, as movies aren't your strong suit, sorry.

review_title: Well. One day Creeper, one day. But this wasn't it.
review_detailed_main:
Jeepers Creepers 1. Fantastic movie. Punchy. Jeepers Creepers 2. Created a fairly good fan base. Had that classic 80 90s horror feel. But just the right amount. Characters with believable stories. Jeepers Creepers 3. Was just the worst. I mean that. Just the biggest piece of trash. How dare they. I mean how dare they. Jeepers creepers 4. Hopefully will never be reborn. Seems like a Disney Channel original series set in a Spirit Halloween store filmed by a boyscout public access group.

The Characters have no connection. They're suppose to be getting married. But he seemed a little gay. And his raspy voice was making me want to give him a glass of honey chamomile.

Everyone who could act had minor rolls. The effects are done in the style of Resident Evil 1 on the og Playstation. But that same darn boyscout group was in charge.

I mean come on.

review_title: So this is what it feels like ...
review_detailed_main:
... when a reboot fails at doing anything right. There is literally nothing in here for anyone. Neither for fans of the older film nor first time watchers.

The 1 extra star is for the weird old couple in the beginning where at least some sort of attempt was made. The switch over to the mystery clip stuff kind of ruined that as well though.

By the way, why the hell did no one think of releasing a reboot 23 years after (in 2024) to mess with the killers 23 year cycle? Think about some connections, man.

So please, ultimately cancel further reboot attempts. This whole thing was just painful to watch and I am usually very generous in the horror genre.

I don't usually write reviews but I feel like I have to so people don't waste there time watching this awful movie. I really enjoyed the Jeepers Creepers 1 & 2 which I thought were pretty scary but this movie was total rubbish, Creepers mask was so baaad & fake it looked nothing like original & the acting was garbage, I feel sorry for the actors & actresses but I'd be ashamed to admit I was in this movie i wouldnt be able to tell family or friends. Some of the background cgi & green screen was so obvious it looked really fake. Wow what a disappointment I really tried to like it but it was just terrible, probably one of the worst movies I've ever seen.

Switched off after half an hour.

Watched the movie in the UK, I really thought this would be better than 3 but it was worse and the actors were no better! This movie makes scooby doo even scarer! Pile of trash and most of the movie sets looked like a screen screen which makes it look fake...

I really wouldn't bother wasting your time I'm this crock of garbage!! The director should be so a shamed of this! And the diversity of actors is shocking! Stop trying to recreate something that's already out there and give (us) viewers the original cast and carry on the storyline. If I could give it a minus I would.

review_title: They must have embezzled the budget
review_detailed_main:
This was the worst movie I have ever seen. Figured it was super low budget but apparently they had 2 million to make this movie which is significantly more than expected based on the terrible acting, dollar store staging and costumes... they couldn't even get the truck right!

Green screen was very apparent, all acting was amateur, props were nonexistent! Don't waste your $6 to rent this. Definitely don't waste your gas to go see it in theater. You'll be much better off sitting at home watching the older ones. I'm not even sure why they bothered to release such a terrible movie or how they even managed to get a 2.4 rating!!!

Who ever wrote and directed this absolute garbage should be banned from the movie industry for not only life but, a thousand lives after that. Terrible Creeper design, constant green screen noticeable, CGI looks like it was created by a 10 year old, and let's not forget about the "acting", hang it up film thespians doubt you'll get hired again wait, ooops, sure you'll get invited for the next installment, "Jeepers Creepers Reborn 2.0". Definitely want a refund for this monstrosity. I urge you all please, for the love of all humanity, DO NOT rent this, dare I say "film", you will totally kick yourselves in the head fir doing so.

Loved 1 and 2. Gave pass marks to number 3 but watched 18 minutes of this movie and turned it off. The acting is appalling, the story is lame and it just doesn't feel like any of the first 3 movies. This was a chance to really give us fans a proper movie. Do not watch this movie I certainly couldn't get through 20 minutes of it and apparently it gets worse. Most disappointed I've been in a movie in a long time. I am really struggling to find the words to review a movie which should have been at least scary. The beginning had none of the tension of the first movie and it just got worse as it went on. A?waste of whatever time you spend watching it.

I didn't like the story line. I didn't like the "romance" story line. I didn't like the lack of a strong masculine male character to lead. The "cosplay" was very stupid. I didn't like the supposed progressive gen Z cultural tilt to the movie. There was an obvious "west coast" vs southern dynamic at odds at play here. And the interracial romance factor (which I don't mind) seems forced and I sense an agenda at play. Let such things happen naturally and not by force. Injecting the culture wars of progressives vs conservative cultural values wasn't necessary. Just entertain us. No more social engineering. No more ideology. No more politics. Just entertain us please. Plus I would appreciate adding more Latinos considering we are more than 25% of the US population eh? Please include us in the casting?

I am so saddened that the 4th installment was so poorly done. There was little storyline and what was there was sloppy. I can forgive the poor special effects makeup of Jeepers Creepers, but the movements and direction or Jeepers Creepers was inconsistent with the other 3... he acted more like a zombie. There were even parts of this movie that started to tell a story, like the couple in the beginning that were just not even finished. What was this production team thinking... asleep behind the wheel. This movie should never have been made, fans will never have confidence to see another. Total waste of time.

This movie destroyed the franchise. Poor casting along with a poor story makes this agonizing to watch. I don't understand how they could stray so far away from the original content. I can't believe we waited four years for this.

It's hard to believe that the director put this movie out there thinking what a good job he did. Rotten Tomatoes score is at 0% with an audience score of 13%.

You could tell Jonathan Breck is no longer playing the creeper. This new actor looks more suited for a western as he moseys around.

CGI was horrible. Sometimes it felt like you were watching a bad youtube video with green screen issues.

Just stay away and hope this director doesn't try to make another movie for the next 23 years.

review_title: Look how they massacred my boy
review_detailed_main:
It is with deep sadness and heavy hearts that we inform you of the death of a classic and nostalgic horror franchise, "Jeepers Creepers". The series we all once loved was in a tragic accident and passed away.

I don't know what they were thinking. This is just a sad disappointment that it's hard to find the words to describe. It's like they were given a decent budget, hired actors and directors from low budget independent films, and pocketed what was left.

This movie should have gone to someone else. Honestly, it would have probably been better in Rob Zombie's hands because this is something I could see in his wheelhouse. (Note: I don't really care for any of Rob Zombie's movies other than Halloween I and II, but I could see him doing better with this than whoever directed it.)

Issues:
Some parts were okay but there was a lot of garbage and cringey lines that just didn't need to exist. The story was just extremely low quality and lazily written, almost as if the people writing it had never watched the previous ones and had to base it off of what they heard.

Hahahaha! From beginning to end, the acting was terrible and felt like they were in their first movie or shooting one of those cheesy films where everyone's reactions to everything are over the top. Something you would see in an old sitcom.

It was immediately apparent that most of the people in this movie had little to no dialect training or experience with an American accent. You could tell their accents were from somewhere in the UK and doing the worst impressions of American accents I've ever heard. For a movie that is based in Louisiana, even the people that were supposed to be from there had garbage accents. The main characters should have at least been written as visiting the country to go to the horror-con and kept their original accents. Then pull a couple of people from Louisiana over to be in the movie or to at least give some pointers to. It would have made more sense to write it in a way that the Creeper migrated or was somehow moved to the UK and then start in a fresh location.

They are making a movie based in Louisiana and the characters are all supposed to be American or at least all have American accents. You would probably film the entire thing out in Louisiana with some minor green screen stuff here and there. From what I've read initial "filming" was done in Lousiana for THREE DAYS and then moved to the UK. They relied so much on green screen and other garbage that it made Sharknado look like Avatar.

There's more but this movie made me sick and I'm tired of talking about it. While writing this I changed the rating from a 2 to a 1.

0 out of 10. Will never watch again.

review_title: WORST MOVIE OF THE ENTIRE YEAR!!!!!
review_detailed_main:
As a fan of Jeepers Creepers (2001), I was really excited for this movie, especially given the fact that Victor Salva wasn't taking a part of the film's production.

After watching the movie on my computer via CAM Version, I will tell you that Jeepers Creepers: Reborn (2022) is atrocious in every single way possible, it's an insult to fans of the original Jeepers Creepers, & it's even worse than Jeepers Creepers 3 (2017). I was miserable & in pain throughout the runtime.

Overall, I suggest that you either watch it or don't watch it for as long as you live, because Jeepers Creepers: Reborn (2022) is easily the worst movie of 2022 & it is one of the worst movies that I've ever seen in my life.

This is jus so terrible I can't even fathom it. In the beginning the old couple was adorable and hands down my favorite characters but after the beginning it's jus downhill from there. It's all just a waste of time I've never not been able to pay attention to a movie this bad before. Honestly wish I wouldn't have even wasted my time with this movie at all and felt the need to come give it a bad review as well even though I've never reviewed a movie on this app before lol.

review_title: the jeepers creeper that never was

This movie was utter garbage and a huge disappointment. This movie feels and looks like it was made by some middle schooler. Most of the places on the movie looks and prolly is on green screen, the acting was utter caca, the script was terrible as well. There was NOTHING that related to the first movie or the way it was in the comics. This movie took its own turn and went off the cliff just offing its self. Honestly Jeepers creeper 2001 will forever be the best of the best. Top tier. Ahead of its own time for that matter and honestly I'm happy for it, because the fact this movie had to even exist in the first place. And to make things worse, WHY DID THEY MAKE A CULT FOR HIM!? That was never part of the story from the first movie and part of the comics which is also canon to everything. I'm telling you, this movie was and is utter poop, not worth the time and not worth your money. If there is anyone who disagrees with this, I can tell they for sure loved the JC3 by that means and calls it "great" even thought they never watched the first or second movie. Or ever read the comics as well. There's a lot of parts where everything is just done bad. The editing was done bad, the acting, the environment looks so fake like if it was done in the green screen, the fact jeepers creepers make up and everything else was done so so bad. The ending was so bad too and well ill let you see for yourself what i mean on how bad it was. All i can say is that the movie was terrible just like JC3 and the movie is not worth your money or time. If you wanna watch it, just watch it online and skip through it because im telling you its BAD alright.

This was the worst "movie" I have seen in a while. Extremely weak and boring build-up to the halfway mark, where hit and miss dialogue is interrupted by predictable events, there is nothing new or clever about the characters. Predictable, predictable. The worst part is they had to drag Dee Wallace into this. Really weak how Laine was "tied up" to the table. It's really just a laughing stock. Literally ANY part of that house would break if you kicked it, but still they could not escape, sad. Also incidentally where I stopped watching. I get this is really, really low budget, but taking a good standing franchise and having it ripped a new a-hole was not nice to see. Not Recommended.

Better than I thought it would be but still terrible though. I watched it in bed on a Sunday morning. Until the end of the film there is quite an absence of the Creeper, seconds at a time if that. The film just didn't add up really. The significance of the woman in the shop who was planning for the youngsters to be sacrificed was just lost once she locked the door. The film made you think that she was a part of it in a bigger way.

This is a prime example of a franchise that has been taken too far and it is now producing the usual horror crap just for the sake of it. The original 'Jeepers Creepers' although not a masterpiece, was original and quite scary.

This piece of trash isn't worth the time.

review_title: Is this what the British think of Americans?
review_detailed_main:
Is this what the British think of Americans? Or is it a Covid era fever dream? Is this guy supposed to be str8? Is this girl supposed to have any sexual chemistry with him at all? Is this a festival or a trailer park hayride? Are these southern accents? Who designed this production? The amount of misused American slang is distracting. This festival is undercast and the main cast is overcrowded. There are 15-20 extras that repeatedly shown dancing to no music at all (but I'd be afraid to see what American music these British people would choose, so that's okay). Who are these random voodoo cult people? Jason and Michael Myers taught us that putting cults in a beloved franchise is always a bad idea. Did anyone actually study voodoo before they wrote this?

They spent the entire budget on flame throwing sideshow performers, bad wigs and identifiably American Halloween costumes. There's even a "sexy" costume montage to pretend that our lead actress has any sex appeal or chemistry with her costar. She literally doesn't even look at him in some scenes. He's so weak, annoying and corny that I can't picture him getting anyone pregnant, let alone this girl who treats him like a friend the entire time... She hates all of his ideas and he wants to marry her? Why do British 20 year olds look 30? The bad weather?

We haven't even gotten to the special effects, yet.

The fake scenery and sets lack all sense of atmosphere or realism. The Creeper's hands aren't even done when we first see him. They're clean human hands. The worms he eats aren't even placed into the scene realistically. They're literally store-bought fish bait, dumped on the ground and ready to eat in broad daylight. After 25 years, his entire outfit is magically ready on a scarecrow nearby and his truck is still in the same spot. The original lore of this creature is that he hunts people's body parts to replace his own dying body parts, but in this movie he is basically just using people as target practice while a Creeper cult hunts a boring pregnant girl. I'm only about 35 minutes into this movie and I've written more than enough to explain my rating.

It looks like this movie was fan made by college students. One of my favorite horror movie monster is destroyed by this mistake of work. Some parts of the movie literally looks like a video game! The special affects are just awful. Let's pretend this movie never existed. The budget for the original film was 10 million and that was 20 years ago and the Budget for this film was 5 million. Complete garbage. Don't support this film. Timo Vuorensolo should never direct any films again. They even changed the way the creeper looks. The creeper Literally looks like a parody for one of the scary movie comedies.

review_title: Do we not screen test films anymore?
review_detailed_main: So I set myself the task to watch the Jeepers Creepers films in order, got through 1, 2 and 3 happily, I put Reborn on and was annoyed instantly, turned the film off at the whistle/vacuum noise part and put the film in the recycling bin, not even good enough to give to the local Oxfam shop, wouldn't recommend if you genuinely enjoyed the first 3 of the franchise and honestly cannot understand what happened, do we not screen test films anymore? Only have to have a few fans watch 10 minutes to find out it's awful, the only minor win for this film was the Creeper costume was ok but that's all. 0* if possible.

This is basically Skeleton Man 2, unless there is already a sequel to that god awful movie then this is the sequel to that. CGI terrible, creeper not scary, everyone's reactions were so scripted. This was almost comedic. Who spent 6 million on this heap of garbage? Could have at least hired one A or B or C list actor, and maybe could have used more than your friends teenage son to do the CGI. I have never left a review before for a movie, but this one was so bad that I had to use my spare time to register and then to type 500 characters about how bad this movie is. Well let me tell ya it was easy and I could write a book about it.

I was excited when I saw they had made a new jeeper creepers but disappointed when I watched it , jeeper creepers didn't even look like him horrified when I saw him didn't even know wth that was . The movie it self was so bad , the actors was bad and I just hated the movie . The originals are 10x better More scary , more entertaining, just way better then any re makes , if y'all going to do re makes of a classic pls do it well I feel they did this just because they wanted to get paid , hated it . Waist of my time even watching. Btw who ever did the makeup of jeeper creepers ! Didnt do a good job.

review_title: Might be the worst movie I ever watched.
review_detailed_main:
This might be the worst movie I've ever watched. Jeepers Creepers 1&2 were good movies. Jeepers Creepers 3 was not. #4 is a travesty. I don't even leave reviews, but I created an IMDB account just to review how bad this was. I would like to call it a train wreck, but that would be simply disrespectful to every train wreck that has ever occurred.

The story has absolute no semblance of continuity from the originals. They know the story ended with an old-man sitting on guard waiting for the reborn right? Where is he? The Creeper doesn't look or feel anything like the original. Perhaps the Creeper knew the movie was going to be so low budget that he spared some expense on his attire? Garbage all around.

When we turned this movie on I was sure to say out loud "Nothing could be worse than the third one". Boy was I wrong. Seriously. Lazy American accents, bad CGI, terrible writing.... It's like the writer and director never saw the first two. Nothing in this movie made sense. Zero continuity... How are the special effects WORSE than 2001? In a world of bad horror sequels THIS has to be among the worst. Seriously, save yourself the 95 minutes and go do LITERALLY anything else. I'd pay them NOT to watch this movie. They couldn't even get the rights to the namesakes song! Do literally anything else with your evening. I'd rather watch c-span 2, the radio version. Just a blank screen with 20 year old department of transportation info.

This review isn't gonna be too long because I'm currently looking for a lawyer to sue the makers of this movie so I can have my 90 minutes back. The CGI looks like it was done by a bunch of grade schoolers for a school science project. And the acting??? Let's just say the actors weren't hired straight out of Juilliard. This is supposed to be a horror movie, but I've seen scarier stuff in a toilet than this piece of work.

I've seen several bad movies in my life, but this one takes the cake. If I could give it zero stars, I would. I've been more entertained sitting down and staring off into space than this movie. By now, you should get the drift. This is the Worst. Movie. Ever.

This is SO TERRIBLE! I am insulted they used the name Jeepers Creepers at all. It's a terrible story, low budget, and pathetic acting. Do NOT waste your time. It's awful. Remember the third instalment and how bad it was? Friggin academy awards material compared to this.

The original was so ....well original. This doesn't even attempt to meet the creepiness or dread factor. It's bad 'teens in peril' nonsense with some kind of Rosemary's Baby bizarro to confuse the whole mess. I kept checking to see how much more I had to endure. I finished it out of stubbornness alone.

Do yourself a favour and go watch the original or even number 2 and 3. Just don't watch this.

This was by far the cheesiest piece of directorial/acting/produced garbage i have seen since. Well 2 weeks ago when i watched halloween ends. But even halloween ends looks like a champion compared to this. Why? Why even put this slop out? Just burn all copies and pretend it never happened. Please! I loved loved the original but this was nothing i mean zero like it. I don't know what it was like because it was Torturous to watch. Please save yourselves people. Don't do it!!! You can go have a more enjoyable experience if you go get matching his and her Labata mees with your significant other. I don't believe anyone who has left a review here can do it justice on just how hellish this movie is.

Is there a kind of magical medication in the world which can let me forget 90 minites? If so, I am sure that I will choose to forget this film. Honestly, I have high expectation of this film but now I realize a high expectation is not a good thing when you have less knowledge and over trust on a film. The director tells the story in a random and insane manner, especially some strange tableaux and plots. I would rather let my eyes eaten by the creeper than watch this film. The only thing related to Creepers Creepers is that the audience would like to treat the director like creepers did in the basement of the church in JC1 because only in this way they can release the ferry. Fans are really disappointed. Famine, virus, earthquake, grasshopper, tornado are only problems, this film is complete CATASTROPHE!

Good night and good luck folks.

This was just bad...lol. It wasn't even a good bad or a bearable bad. Everything single thing they did was unbearably, dreadfully idiotic.

Windows are boarded with wood...kick them out.

What kind of decrepit house has a working phone? Lol I'd like to think it was set up to mess with them...to toy with them in thinking there's hope..but I don't think this storyline holds that much creativity.. I feel terrible for the names connected with this movie.

I sat down I just wanted to watch something...not serious, not sad, just a stupid jump scare... I wish they stopped at 3.

Oh my... do yourself a solid...and don't bother.. I went through the torture, so you don't have to, lol!

The creeper has never been a slasher film, EVER! This movie has completely made a mockery of the creeper. Horrible movie whoever wrote this should be taken out back and beaten with a hose! There is no way this should even be considered a jeepers creepers movie.

1. The creeper looked like he was 5' tall.

2. The story line was iffy at best.

3. The first 30 minutes you barely see the creeper at all.

4. This seemed like a last ditch effort to try and revamp a movie series that should not have even made the 3rd one.

I am a huge fan of jeepers creepers 1 and 2, I grew up fearing the creeper; this has just made the creeper a style he isn't. I have wasted a portion of my life watching a last ditch effort to revamp a horror icon that needs no revamping. Hulu should be ashamed for putting this out, it's complete trash!

This movie is an embarrassment. Everyone involved needs to be ashamed of themselves. They literally RUINED the jeepers creepers franchise. It's freaking 2022!!! Start making better movies. The story is extremely Lame, the characters are bad, the acting is sub par. Only a few of the actors are actually decent, the make up of the creeper is really bad. They ruined the way the creeper looks. At least in the previous one the creeper looked the same as the first two movies. I can't believe this movie actually exists and is part of this franchise and will be now forever. We really need to start doing better.

review_title: I never thought Jeepers Creepers could die until now.
review_detailed_main: I hope this film encouraged the makers of part 1 and 2 to make a new movie. They cannot let this movie be the final version of this great horror... This was by far one of the the worst films that I have ever. They took a year to make this??? It looks like it took a weekend. And was this shot with a green screen, the whole movie? Because it looks like it was, and someone left the bathroom light on, because no matter where they went there was always an unnatural white light over them... Even when they was in the "woods". I blame the produces, writers, directors, actors, and whom ever was suppose to watch the final cut before releasing this crapola.

review_title: You can watch this movie as a comedy, it fits perfectly...
review_detailed_main: I went to see this with my best friend and we were most of the movie laughing for the horrible plot this movie has. It just doesn't have actual sense, the ending is the worst part, it feels like they didn't had enough time to make good cgi like at the beginning or they completely gave up making a decent plot and messed up so bad that you can't believe what is actually happening, the cult people seems to be an interesting reason for the creature to develop but end up ignored entirely with the time, so much things won't never just work in the plot because in some way they didn't make the correct effort.

The only thing I liked about this movie was seeing Dee Wallace & Gary Graham. The original Creeper would be terribly disappointed to see what you did to this franchise. Terrible acting with no chemistry. The opening sequence was good, paying homage to the original but after that it's like watching Nightmare on Elm Street 12: Freddy Gets His Nails Done. This wasn't scary at all. A total Spring Break movie for Justin Bieber fans. After 1 & 2 they should never have any more of these. A waste of screen time. An hour and a half of my life I'll never get back. I'm sure Justin Long would agree. Let's retitle this Jeepers Sleeper: Still Born.

This movie is SO BAD that it kept me up from falling asleep. My mind just couldn't take it, I wanted to know if there was any scene in the movie worth appreciating. But, there's none. Even nuns are scarier than THIS JEEPER-CREEPER! My favourite franchise ruined. Thanks.

Seriously, what in the name of horror genre I just watched? Who is responsible for this mess? I would like to sue the people responsible for ruining my favourite horror franchise. Ugh. And, I'm mad that It was $6.99 to rent!!!

This looks like a D grade version of Escape Room who a bunch of teens shot to show their tacky CGI effects. There's no continuity, plot, or even a scare in this movie. And, I thought Sharknado was funny.

Jeepers Creepers is an awesome 2000s creature flick but this atrocity was turned off.

And let me be frank, I love d, e, f movies. Thankskilling is amazing. But those are supposed to be campy and fake and good for a laugh. Asylum movies are always good for that.

I'm my lifetime(33 years) I have sent back food at a restaurant once and walked out on one movie and this was it.

The story actually starts ok with dialogue a bit amateur with our protagonists going to a horror festival in the town where the Creeper lore started. It introduces a new spin on the series and has some satanic tones. Then, before leaving, we enter a green screen room and that's a wrap for this review.

What were you guys smoking when you made this? Should not have named it the title you guys did because it is not up to par with any of the old JC movies. Just delete the film from existence. Extremely amateur directing, acting and filming. The story doesn't even pick up from the old ones. Creeper also looks less intimidating. The story line is such a cliche. Also, there isn't much action like the old movies where it keeps you on your toes.

Good thing I didn't see this in theater because I would've wasted my money so don't bother going. If you're extremely bored out of your mind and have nothing better to watch (highly doubt when compared to this film) then go ahead and start but I know you will not be able to finish because it's so cringe.

The first movie was really good. It was both exciting and mysterious. The second movie wasn't bad as it coincided with the 23rd day of the first movie. Then in the 3rd part actually the place is 1.5. The sequel was filmed. In other words, the movie ended as of the end of the second episode.

Now they couldn't stand it and shot another episode.

Horror movie of 2022. Broken from the 3 parts made before, only the creature is similar. I say similar because even that is not the same. Something like a jester. I think there is a deep structure established to disgrace this kind of one or two-part films. The creature fights hand to hand. It's funny but not funny. The plot is bad, the effects and make-up are terrible, the acting is mediocre. I'm sure the majority of the audience watched it for the sake of the first movie and they all regretted it.

Still, I'll point it out for those who will watch. Sex and nudity are ignored in the film.

It starts off with two horror movie legends. Dee Wallace and Gary Graham.

Then it flushes the movie down the toilet.

The actors can't act. The director didn't help the actors at all.

No movie magic in this one. Even Jeepers Creeper's head looked too big for his body. It reminded me of Jim Carey in "the Mask".

The movie was goofy as soon as the first scene was over.

I wanted to shut it off after the first 5 minutes. I kept watching it hoping everyone of these crappy actors would die.

I guess you will have to watch it to see for yourself. There hasn't been any great movies in a long time. So we are stuck with this nonsense.

The movie sucks, the characters suck, the storyline sucks, actors suck, director sucks and so on. Someone put up the money for this rubbish and someone put this out to be seen. Main couple are non believable as a couple and unoriginal, but it's the storyline that's so bad you can't believe someone thought it should be a movie and make it. Shows one thing, anyone can make a movie, not everyone should tho ! I enjoyed the first two in this franchise, third was very lazy but watchable, this you'd have to be high to get through it. Had a joint halfway through and still didn't make it better. So if your a fan like I was, give this a miss and pretend they never made it.

This movie is horrible. The 3rd one was even better than this........ the CGI is like a bad...... no a really bad SyFy movie. A shame they turned such a good idea into such a bad movie. I liked the first Jeepers Creepers and the 2nd even tho other people didn't. Guessing there will be no more Jeepers Creepers movies which is a shame. I would say the podcast How Did This Get Made should do this movie..... but I don't even think they could make it funny. This movie isn't even funny bad. The acting is horrible, the Creeper is not even a little scary, there's no suspense. I dont't understand what they were going for or how this was even released in theaters. It shouldn't even be a straight to video release. So disapponting and completely ruined a great monster franchise. Hopefully they'll try again in abother 10 years.

review_title: Jeepers Sleepers! Hollywood Is Getting Dumber & Dumber!
review_detailed_main: What a horrible movie! How Does Hollywood Live With Themselves Anymore? Society is getting dumber & dumber! How could this movie even be allowed? Seriously? You would think after success in the first two Creepers Movies after butchering the 3rd that they would take their time to bring it back with some dignity! Nope. Don't even waste your time watching this Hot Garbage! Horrible acting, horrible plot & horribly everything else. This is really sad too because the 1st two Jeepers Creepers were actually pretty good. They had a good story line and intense acting. The sad thing was they made the ending of the 2nd one extremely interactive with the old man waiting for it to come back to life. Made you excited about the 3rd film only to extremely disappoint! Then they have their chance to try again and they make it even worse! Don't waste your time!

review_title: Not even bad enough to be good-bad
review_detailed_main:
From the first minute to the last this is a travesty of a movie and an insult to the original JC. Its only hope was to get campy enough to be enjoyed as an awkward cringe-fest. I could at least respect that, but it falls well short of even that.

Further description is pointless. Although I do hope there's a behind the scenes special some day to explain how a movie this gawdawful ever saw the light of day.

As another reviewer wrote, let's all just pretend this lazy, pointless, disjointed, steaming pile of unwatchable garbage was never made. That's more kindness than it deserves, but let's do it for ourselves.

This movie only deserves 10 stars or anything about 1 star if they only delete the film from existence. Even then, it'd be hard to give a 10 star, as it's burned into memory for existing.

Sydney Craven's acting for the most part was on point and top notch that was limited and sullied by the story line for this film. She definitely has potential, with a more serious and better film that can shine her abilities as an actress. She has played in A Christmas Carol and I enjoyed that movie all the way through. This film definitely took advantage of her and I hope it does not prevent her from better chances to come.

Jarreau Benjamin may be a good actor, but his role as the creeper definitely hurt him here. I have not seen the other film he was in, so I cannot say for sure.

Imran Adams's character was basic, lame and downright ruined most of the storyline aside from Jarreau Benjamin's role as the creeper. I have not seen any of the other films he starred in, so maybe they just gave him a poor script. Who knows.

As for the rest of the case, most of them were over the top for no reason at all, should not of been had or for the case of Georgia Goodman who played Lady Manilla, was not used to full advantage that could of been had if those behind the scripting and production had even tried!

The writers, production crew, etc are all to blame for this nasty failure of what was once a great franchise. It might be very well time to scrap this entire project and stop trying to deliver new films for this franchise. The first three films were great, in my opinion, even though many hated or disliked the third installment, I know I enjoyed it myself.

This was a reboot and they tried changing way too much. They lost the original fans and many new ones on this one. They took a risk and lost it all here. It's amazing that this film had a $5 million dollar budget and they delivered us something of such low quality. Makes you wonder what they really wasted the money on. Drugs? Alcohol? Illegal activities..? Who knows, in the end there is almost no love left for this franchise. Time to do better or quit. And if this is the best that can be delivered, it's definitely time to quit for those behind the Jeepers Creepers franchise or hand over the mantle to someone with more skill.

review_title: There nothing like a good horror film!
review_detailed_main:
And this was nothing like a good horror film! If you really want to honor the fans of the series then promise us you will never make another JC film again ever! The writing was bad. The acting was bad, the effects were bad, the creeper was comical and not even remotely scary.

I think they were attempting to make the creeper more brutal and savage but in doing so they lost the stalking/smell your fear to see if I will eat you nature of the creeper and that is what made him so terrifying.

The main characters were so underwhelming and underdeveloped I could have cared less what happened to them?

And were there supposed to be two creepers, did the creeper drop off a creeper in the beginning? Like wtf was this movie about?

This movie looks like what would happen if you gave a high school drama club a green screen and $200.10.

review_title: the 1st one was Citizen Kane compare to this
review_detailed_main:
Yes. That's how bad this one is. Because the first one was pretty much mediocre. In fact, it was bad, but it was saved somehow by a fairly good, suspensful start. But this one... this one feels like a bad joke, one that is crazily bad and also not even self-aware, so the fun is completely absent.

Some of the actors (well, the main male character only, in fact) try to defend this from sinking, but it all goes down mercilessly. I'm in fact mad about Spain distributors, who got this one in theaters this week and I went to see it thinking - well, if it's in the movies I cannot be that bad. Boy, was I wrong...

review_title: It IS as BAD as the reviews say.
review_detailed_main: It is my opinion that the writers/producers of this sequel needs to apologize to its Jeeoers Creepers fans. We waited so long and this is what you give us??? The acting is very weak and the story isn't solid or clear of what the whole reborn means. The Creeper doesn't act like the other Creepers and his costume is ridiculous. The Creeper is my favorite horror villain so I had to go see it, yet I was TERRIBLY disappointed!!! I honestly feel I could have written a better story with absolutely no writing experience whatsoever! There is no connection with the characters and there is a constant feel of, where is this going?? I literally could not wait until this movie was over.

I could not manage to watch the whole movie...utter garbage, the worst movie I 've seen in cinema since decades. The third movie was bad, but thus movie was more than riduculous The Creeper looked like a cheap halloween costume and there was no real story. Why do they make such stupid things, are they dumb, they must have known that this movie is garbage, why do they release this insult for rvery horror movie fan. I was really angry and I left it after 50 minutes, cause I was afraid to kill myself. I went into another movie and looked the second half of Smile...they killed this franchise damn...................

review_title: why does it get worse and worse?
review_detailed_main: Its mockery at this point. I dont know what to say. You cant think of a good plot anymore? Did the directors/producers of the first two films completely change because these last two films are 360 degrees the other way. Completely different atmosphere from the first two masterpieces. Its more funny than scary- thats the problem. This is a horror franchise. I think an origin story (which was first promised) would have been more appropriate and fitting. The plot makes no sense. And the creeper decided to lose 5 inches btw?? And the makeup isnt even the same. Looke like a completely different creature. You guys put NO EFFORT. 0. No effort was put into finding the right actors, right makeup, wardrobe. Im not disappointed. Im mad. Im mad that movies are going downhill. Production sucks. We need new crew, people with ORIGINALITY, and taste.

I knew this was trash as soon as it came on. Finally, for fun, about an hour in, I looked on here to see how poorly it's rated. 2.5 Are you kidding me? I don't even bother if it's under a 5, but ASSumed because of the title it would be at least a 5. Nope.

I feel like I could still have a pretty solid acting career after watching this. I 100% know I could write something better. Something actually scary. With a story.

The cgi is awful and I don't know anything about how that works, but it's ok because apparently whoever worked on this didn't know either.

The only reason we even started this heap was because my wife refused to watch the new Terrifier flick. She hates scary movies The jumps, and the gore, the violence, all of it. Hates it, but she definitely wishes we had watched the entire Art the Clown franchise instead of this disaster.

review_title: Jeepers Creepers Reborn, more like Jeepers Creepers green screen
review_detailed_main:
When the trailer came out, i already knew it will be a very bad movie. Even tho i saw the ratings i wanted to give it a try and see myself how bad it is. IT'S REALLY BAD, the trilogy is a MASTERPIECE when you compare them to this crappy movie. The whole movie was green screen, i didn't even know what was even real. The plot was really stupid, really boring, the acting was meh, the cinematography was mehhh. PLEASE DON'T waste your time with this movie! I just wasted my time and I'm so sorry. Jeepers Creepers Reborn is quite possibly one of the worst films I've ever seen.

Think it was directed and produced by 12 year olds.

review_title: A horrible remake that ruined a beloved franchise.
review_detailed_main:
This is supposed to be a reboot to the original jeepers creepers and it is by far the WORST creeper film to date. Where the first one drew you in with story and horror, the second one brings you in with action, the third fills in lore. This one brings in stupidity horrible acting, and the worst horror tropes to date. Whoever thought rebooting this franchise would be a success is losing ALL of their money. They should have just continued the story of the original series and got better actors. The story is abysmal, the costume and design of the actual creeper is pathetic. Everything about this SCREAMS fan made crap. This is honestly the worst movie I have seen in years.

Do not waste your time.

review_title: PLEASE TELL ME THIS WAS A PRANK

review_detailed_main: Whoever is responsible, just quit now. Find another career... Rethink your future... You have failed miserably at movies and film. This junk has probably ruined a successful franchise that will likely never recover. I really just cannot find anything positive to say which pains me and if a 0 rating were possible, that would be my choice. The list of bad things about this movie is just too long to mention here. I started fast forwarding through the horrible acting and dialogue just to get to the end. Not because I wanted to see how it ended, which was ridiculous, but simply to feel better about my 99 cent rental. No more impulse rentals for me!

I'm sad at the amount of tom foolery that went on in this movie. Whoever put this out needs they arse whipped. Corny actors, poor script and scenes that's don't add up. I'm mean eww, I'm so disappointed . Please pay the writers correctly, darn it . By the way I wasn't even scared just mad annoyed at the low budget quality and it wasn't even the real jeepers creeper it was a junkie from skid row. It's the lack of changing the accent change for me. My nephews can do better special effects on on iMovie. Also, YouTube is always hiring. Throw the WHOLE movie away. I am more than angry, because I love the jeepers creepers franchise and this movie is despicable.

This was the worst hour and a half of my life I will never get back. I understand it is a reboot for the series. But it turned out to be a funeral for the series. Background imaging was way off. Truly ruined a good series. I recommend that nobody wastes their time. They even made the creeper look like he was cracked out. Major thumbs down. They truly should of done a better job not only with the script but at least make the story line a little more believable. My god Jeepers Creepers 3 had a far better story line than this. It should of went from filming straight to the trash can. Hopefully no more trash like this one.

review_title: Worst movie ever an insult to recent jeeper creepers movies!
review_detailed_main: First off to not have Jonathan Breck as the creeper big mistake and number two not to have Victor Salva, direct as he did the other ones huge mistake. This movie was so terrible. The acting was terrible. Totally hated how generic the creeper looked. Why even bother making this movie it was worth one watch and not even that do not waste your money going to the movies to see this wait for it to stream but even on streaming which I did this movie is going to make you mad so terrible as I am a huge fan of the other jeepers creepers movies this one was a big let down. What huge disappointment!!!!!!

I'm not going to talk about details cuz is lot to talk about but this is the worse one in the movies sequel, I was very excited to watch the JC reborn but I was very disappointed, very stupid scenarios, an amateur could do better than that, very cheap budget, for real they destroy the movie reputations. The makeup, the story, the special effects, the overall look of the creeper is so far from the original that I would have thought it was someone immitating the creeper and its' story. Someone deserves a big slap in the mouth for putting this garbage on the screen. I got totally cheated by JC3 and Fathom Entertaiment "events", and I fell for it again. What a POS this movie is and it is so hard to believe that this story is so far off the mark. It's not reborn it's aborted... and there is not much chance that a true fan of the series will be duped into falling for a fifth installment after this garbage. What a damned shame this movie was made and released the way it was. I can't even begin to think of a spoiler besides saying that you will feel like you wasted your time and money even before leaving the theater. How anyone could possibly give this movie movie than 1 star is beyond me.

review_title: Created an account just to rant about this stinker!
review_detailed_main:
I don't know where to start. This was truly an awful film. There's no chemistry between the leads, the plot is conflated and nonsensical.. I don't know if the CGI or the dialogue worse and all established blore was completely abandoned. And don't even get me started on the acting. Oh and the idiotic characters and their idiotic decision making. None of this was even remotely believable. They started losing me at the "creepy random antique shop, by the festival I was annoyed and by the third act I was angry but figured since I came this far I might as well see it through and was even angry about that cause the ending.. oh boy.

I don't know who made this movie or who they made it for but they need to just not. I assume it was a cash grab but they literally just burned this entire IP which is a shame cause 2024 would be the 23rd anniversary be of the OG and that could have been something special.

This is what happens when a new director comes on board. He messes everything up. Now i know part 3 wasnt the best, but compared to this train wreck it was a 10. Salvas creeper was scary and so damn awesome looking. This one looked like the great value brand creeper. It was just plain awful. Please do us a favor and let it die here. Well unless Salva returns to salvage it. I dont recommend this movie unless u absolutly feel the need to laugh endlessly at the cheap effects bad directing and bad acting and definitely that awful looking creeper..dont waste your time. Watch paint dry instead. You will thank me later.

Do not waste your time with the low budget, badly directed and wooden acting in this awful remake. The originals are way better in every aspect. I can't believe they decided to rip off the rights holders to create this utter rubbish. It's not even decent B movie stuff. Wait for the new reboot of the Creeper stuff, you will waste time watching this. I made it an hour in before I realised any kid with a camera could do way better. This is just a badly written grab for cash by the makers. I really can't express how bad this film actually is. In this day and age of cheap computer Fx, the quality of these effects shine for how bad they are and nothing else.

All I can say is that this is by far one of the worst, most poorly made films. To call this a horror movie is an insult to the horror/thriller genre. I feel like the industry is ruined with lazy writing and just lacking creativity all around. Watch anything but this. It's baffling to me that this is what's being put on streaming platforms. A utter complete waste of time and just down right a headache to watch. The ONLY reason I finished it was because I have a need to finish what I started but if it wasn't for my OCD I would've deleted my account because this movie was just so freaking terrible. I could've made a better film and I have zero experience in film making.

This is the worst film to ever be made in the history of cinema! This movie makes the Flinstones movie look like an Oscar winner. Replacing the original creeper was a huge mistake and the film has a hollyoaks Halloween special feel about it it's that bad. I could have made a better movie on my iPhone with my mates. Avoid at all costs. I think all involved with this movie should re-evaluate their career paths after this. The only way to salvage this franchise is to go back to the origin of the creeper and build from there. Somewhat like they did with Prey after the failure of The Predator. 0 out of ten for me.

I watched to the end because I like the first 2. But wow this was terrible. It looks like it was shot entirely in front of a green screen. The actors have daytime lighting on their faces and the scenery is night.

Also, the accents are all terrible. Distractingly bad.

Overall, they've taken the jeepers creepers character and made a movie that does not align with the original franchise and also doesn't make any sense.

The first half of the movie is just weird talking and fake driving. It has no eerieness, mystique or foreboding. Then it turns into a movie more like Texas chainsaw massacre than jeepers creepers. It's pretty much only good for hatewatching.

Think "Thriller" video & B-acting in a Scooby-Doo video game. Only Velma was on the villian's side. Cheesy old-fashioned horror type. Opened interesting, but dropped. Story was good, just took too long to get there. Love the new "Creeper" car. Mapping of story was sooooo off. Also, the size of the Creeper is noticeable & disappointing smaller. My take is, one's muscles attrify in 23 years of nonuse. The slightest tweek in character makes a difference in the audience's love for the character. The face tweeked a little, but can live with it. Lose that breast plate, please. What's up with the more fashionesta Creeper. Please lose that high collar on his villian coat. That hat never loses it's shape now. Go back to the original guy who looked stronger & orig. Body suit & orig. Creeper clothes.

I wish the main characters would have worked on their American accents a bit more or just set it in the UK, it kind of took me out of it. NONE of the characters werent really built out or likable. I was excited to watch this thinking it would be a continuation of the trilogy, but... nope. Rushed cash grab. Boooooo.

The first 10 minutes were just a rehash of the first movie. Theres a "nod" and there is just copying something beat for beat. The only good thing about this movie was being able to see Dee Wallace, such a legend. I wish she was the main focus here and that she had some original stuff to work with during her screen time.

If i watched it as a standard b movie that has nothing to do with the original series I think I would have liked it a lot more.

Just got through wasting an 1 1/2 of my time I will never get back. The story was boring and the Creeper looks nothing like the original. I wanted to shut this movie off halfway because I couldn't get into this movie but I still wanted to know what direction they were going with this movie. Unfortunately this movie has no direction. So many points in this movie that makes you wonder where they're going with this but hardly any explanation. Hell the song played in this crappy movie wasn't even the original song from the first one. Don't know what the cult had anything to do with the Creeper in the first place. This ending was just complete and utter BS as it is with the rest of this film. If I could give this movie 0 stars, I would.

This was a giant slap in the face to Crepper fans. You should've made an origin story for the Creeper. This, however, was an abomination to the entire franchise (yes, including the 3rd installment) I feel disrespected as a fan and even more disrespected that I wasted my time, energy and money watching it. Very disappointing!!! Also, the CGI was ridiculously tacky, like, no lie. I feel like I could've worked on this movie having no theatrical experience, no visual experience, no production experience, etc. Do not waste your time watching this film, and if you do then you too won't enjoy it. It's so bad that it's laughable. 0/10 stars!!!

The producer and the crew should be banned from making movies. The worst movie i have ever watched my entire life. The first one was decent and catchy. From the moment i saw the creeper crawling out the shed i knew i messed up choosing this ridiculous movie. What were they thinking. I was excepting something like the first Jeepers Creepers or even better but this one was a huge disappointment. The story and the act was very week. Can we some how file a law suit for ruining the legacy of the first one. This shouldn't go unpunished. The producer has no idea what is he doing nor the actors. Anyone who value his time and mental health shouldn't watch it. Its an eye sore and a waste of time.

review_title: Poor attempt of resurrection of a once great horror.
review_detailed_main: Literally one of the worst movies I have seen in a long time. Let me save you some time. I have never written a review before, but the poor level of everything put to film on this movie screams for help, and not in a good way. The CGI, the dialog, the acting, the very plot, or lack of. None of these characters were provided any real redeeming qualities to make you root for them. The only one I was rooting for was the Creeper to Jill them faster in order to get done with the movie!! You can tell it wasn't written by the original writer, and I question if it was written by someone who has never seen another horror movie in their lifetime!! Don't waste your time!!

review_title: Grew up to the creeper being scary. Ummm WTH is this
I CAN DIRECT THIS FILM BETTER
review_detailed_main:
I was hoping the reviews would be wrong for this film but they are completely right. I couldn't even sit through and watch this film, I skipped to the parts where they creeper was on screen but was disappointed. In my opinion this movie and the last movie has ruined the franchise. I think I would direct a better film with no experience.

I wish I didn't have this opinion as Jeepers Creepers 1 and 2 are one of my favourite horror films. The first two films did it brilliantly, however with this film it is completely different. This did not feel like a movie but a cheesy film done for a school project.

However, I do see where this film was going, some parts of the story from what I skipped through showed us more information about the creeper but I just wish it was depicted in a better way.

Main points: Abuse of CGI - it was laughable, one scene really made me chuckle but besides that it hurt my eyes. The film lacked depth, almost felt two dimensional when watching it. The cinematic dynamics were polar opposites of the original.

The creeper looked like a Halloween costume, didn't feel authentic from how it was originally depicted, you can clearly tell at the start it's just a guy poorly painted.

review_title: Worse than a lot of the others
A story about a girl and her "not gay" boyfriend.

review_detailed_main:
The only thing I can really say about this movie is that if this one was the original title today we wouldn't have the Jeepers Creepers franchise. It is sincerely one of the worse movie I ever seen, especially if we take in consideration it belongs to a well established name.

Yes, a remake is always a danger, a bigger one than a simple sequel, but here there is so much wrong, it cannot even to aspire to be a trash cult, neither of course a beloved B-Movie.

If Hollywood is good in making Movies, it excels when is about actors casting and storytelling, which is two of the big reasons we watch and love USA movies almost everywhere in the world, here in Europe like in Asia or Africa. And in order to be appealing to such variety of people and cultures, it means they are really good especially where is needed to be able to relate or at least to be understandable.

This movie is one of those very few in which those two very important aspects are totally missed. The casting is very poor, acting is not there, you can tell they are people who are pretending to be someone else, which IS acting of course, but the point is doing it while you make the audience forget you are a real person, and give us the total full immersion of the fantasy. Really bad acting no one excluded.

The cosplay fair scenes, for example, are so bad, with so few extra, basically there is only the performers and almost no crowd, with some scene in which the performers are looking into the camera! Horrific indeed, no pun untended.

I mean, they could copy Rob Zombie imaginary and visual and having something real cool, instead they went for this cheap situation, it feels like they hired some cool performers "psycho Circus" and than said to them : ok go and do your things... Maybe because I love that style of things, I am pretty disappointed.

The story is the other huge problem because it's so basic to result silly and again, not in the right way: It's just lazy, goes nowhere, has many holes leading to nothing, and one of the most un-impressive final scene ever. Which is something considering we are talking about horror.

The cherry on top is, as everybody say, an utterly bad CGI running during almost all movie, one of the worse we ever had since CGI is massively used in movies.

It takes a special kind of talent to call your franchise reboot Jeepers Creepers: Reborn (2022) and promptly kill the series you are trying to resurrect. A young couple go to a horror convention (that is scary enough) and get selected to do an escape room house based around the local legend of The Creeper, the winged man-monster that shows up every 23 years. What they don't know is this is all a set up to make them the creature's latest meal.

For better or worse, Victor Salva's Jeepers Creepers trilogy was a solid intro for a new "horror icon" (© every horror news site). It set simple rules and had its monster attack people. This follows that same set up, but tries to up it with some bizarre new plot twists. For example, this one features a cult that worships the Creeper and brings the victims to them. If you are hoping for more info than that, you will be sorely disappointed. The film literally has the cult trap the people in the house, one of them says, "They're all yours now" and then they walk away, never to be seen again. There is an interesting new idea where the Creeper can attach dead body parts to its own damaged body to regenerate, but again it is never fully explained. Heck, if it was it wouldn't even matter as the film is so cheaply made. A lot of criticism online has been about how damn cheap the film looks and I can't disagree. From the fake sets to the greenscreen work to the fake CGI, it looks more like a bad Youku movie. Director Timo Vuorensola made those terrible looking Iron Sky films, so it makes sense this looks just as bad. You know you've screwed up when the viewer is wishing for the more subtle style of Salva. I did get a couple of laughs from dumb bits like the phone in the decaying mansion still working (did the Creeper immediately start a phone plan when it was resurrected that morning?) and the bit where the hip Youtube crew (ugh!) following our leads find their cameraman dead minutes after they arrive at the house and one says, "It's fresh, whatever got him just got here." Of course it is fresh! You literally just got there with the man! Sadly, boneheaded stuff like that can only entertain so much.

I get the vision of the movie...Set a Halloween movie vibe with realism to the creeper; more of a slasher. Creepy vibe but still messy storyline until mid late into the movie, makes up for the rest at least. They tried to separate themselves from the rest of the series that it cost the franchise. If it were up to me get ANY DIRECTOR besides the guy from iron sky and it'd be better. Poor decision making. If I have to add any more words to pass 600 ima tell you how bad this movie really is please....97 characters required I just want to say BAD it's BAD. Please is this not enough for you my lord please let me post.

review_title: I straight up deleted my copy of the film after watching...

...to prevent myself ever again from falling prey to this cesspit that has to be the beginning of a hiatus for the series.

This was so...poorly made that I truly don't know where to begin? The first two films in the series being the benchmark here, it's almost as if the producers of this film NEVER saw the original films, and watched like 45 minutes of the third film and came up with this.

The lighting of this film doesn't suffer the same fate of so many overly dark horror films, where little can be seen...because this is neither a horror film, and it's overly lit. This over-lighting exposes the creeper far too much, and he is less a stalking menace that is hunting it's prey, rather an quasi-superhero. All of this leaves this feeling like a low budget action film with light horror overtones.

Should I get started with the obvious social engineering and forced diversity and interracial pairing that *every* studio is forcing on us in a totally-not conjoined effort? Well that's there too. So instead of the writers and producers writing characters and casting actors who were appropriate for the story, you get Black Guy, White Woman, Generally Asian, and old white guy to bind them together. They're equally disinteresting and equally disingenuous feeling, so I guess that IS equality.

Just don't waste your time.watch Jeepers Creepers 1 or 2 instead.

Maybe in 10-20 years someone will realize the true potential of the Creeper and make a worthy remake, like The Thing or Halloween.
